title: Value is ok.
desc: Booked this hotel for a 1-night stopover. Location is 5 min drive from airport - although it is so new that taxi's get lost. It is actually right beside Capri hotel. So the hotel is new which is good. It's fairly clean and the rooms are modern. One thing is they seem to have used very cheap beds with no real support. I guess the beds are new but just the quality is poor. It is in a rapidly developing area with numerous shops and cafes and restaurants either just open or opening soon. Price ($180) was ok, but not really worth it. I know SIngapore is expensive. Anyway, I do recommend this hotel for a simple stopover. It does the job - just don't expect to much.

title: Ideal for short stay
desc: This is an excellent hotel for a short stay close to changi airport. Staff were friendly and efficient. The room was spacious and clean with a safe, iron and tea/coffee making facilities. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. A feature of the hotel is it's proximity to the airport. One stop away on the MRT for which nearly any credit card functions as a ticket. Once at Expo MRT, Park Ave hotel is 100m away. There is a supermarket plus fast food and other restaurants and hotels nearby. My only reservation was the shower over the bathtub. .

title: Aziz and Marie were very helpful and accommodating
desc: Excellent. Quiet. Clean. Spacious. Great gym and pool. Laundromat. Aziz and Marie were very helpful and accommodating. Excellent. Quiet. Clean. Spacious. Great gym and pool. Laundromat. Aziz and Marie were very helpful and accommodating

title: excellent accomodation
desc: The service was very excellent, a room i was sleeping in was very neat and used to be cleaned everyday. The thing i liked the most hotel is that it was situated just by the convention centre where the course was held and therefore i did not have a need to pay any extra charges when attending the course.

title: Special staff
desc: Great service from all the staff and in particular, Faiz - a warm welcome and help getting settled - thank you. The room was spotless and kept that way throughout my stay. A large, well equipped and very comfortable room at a very conveniently situated hotel.

title: Professional commitment
desc: It is a hotel that gives a correct and real image of hotel professionalism. A committed and present staff, with a smile and the hospitality requested. le staff respect son engagement dans le temps, et avec une qualité bien évalué.

title: Super Clean, kind staff . Good location
desc: The hotel is clean. Staff is kind to guest. Safety location. Good location for expo center. We will come back again . Posible in 2035 Asia conference . Nice view from the room. Good food. Superd hotel interior. Has a free water. Thumbs up

title: Top notch hotel
desc: I was very pleased with my stay at this hotel and would definitely stay here again. It is in close proximity to everything that you could need in regards to food, transportation, the Expo centre, etc.

title: Good and Safe
desc: The hotel is a very safe space, the employees are very available, and the breakfast is good. The rooms are clean, e equip with the basics, the view is satisfactory, its close to a mall and a MRT station, that's helpful to reduce the distance from the city center. An overall good experience.

title: Very accommodating staff
desc: The Staff named Feuz are Very Accommodating and Kind , Plus the Rooms are Clean and Very comfortable to sleep with, and Props to the Room Maintenance team they are also very Kimd and Approachable speciall The Filipina staff who never cease to Assist Us

title: Very nice!
desc: I strongly recommend this hotel to every one, it is very nice and near to the airport which makes very nice for any international people. In addition, the staffs were very kind, the foods has variety and delicious.

title: Clean and convenient
desc: Stayed only one night for a business trip. Convenient location to use flights at Changi airport. Clean and comfortable room. No complaints. As it’s in business park, no good restaurants and food area nearby.

title: Good location, ok hotel
desc: Good location to Changi airport and expo. Short walk from MRT. Plenty of food and shopping options within minutes. Hotel was pretty basic. I must have stayed in a really small room as it was definitely that. Had the smallest bathroom that was not very nice to be in. Room was dated and in need of some comfort. Had a kitchenette with no cooking or eating supplies ie no plates, cutlery, pans. Not really sure what you were supposed to use. Check-in/out was easy and staff were friendly enough. Basically it was average.

title: Very private place, love it
desc: Great for a short getaway stay with your loved one if you want privacy and peace away from hustle and bustle of the city. Everything else from food to amenities, is very convenient. Got the deluxe room which is of good size and bed is gooood.

title: Friends Visit
desc: I was there with my fiancee and her sisters. The deluxe setting was very suitable for us as it has a king bed in one room and a double bed in another. Nice soundproofing and sleep quality. Just a little bit pricey but i guess it is worth it.

title: Lim Huan Pei
desc: Great hotel to be.. for traveller who want to visit jewell can consider this hotel as it is 1 mrt stop away from hotel and nearby have shopping center too . Room n staff services is great will be back soon

The room is cozy and clean. The receptionist Faiz is very helpful in assisting us to change to another room when we have issues with the aircon. When i left my room card, he also did not mind in giving me an extra card just so i can go up to my room.. Recommended!

title: Great place for in transit
desc: Excellent overnight stay in transit. Great place to stay of short stay. Expo train station one stop from the airport. Rooms clean and comfortable. Good food reasonably priced outside. Easiest check in ever. Would stay again without a second thought.

title: Great hotel near the airport
desc: Well priced hotel in close proximity to airport. The train station is just near the hotel making it easy to catch the train to the airport or the city centre. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Lots of food outlets within walking distance giving various options for dining.

title: We Want to Give Staff, Faiz ,in Park Avenue Changi a Big Applause!
desc: It’s a great experience that the staff called Faiz giving us such a comfortable reception service. He helped me grab three luggages to our room and greeted politely with us. It’s so pleasurable to stay this hotel as our first day in SGP.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: Have a wonderful staycation experienced with our family having visited by our eldest son who we had never seen for almost 3years. Kudos to Mr Kamal who rendered excellent customer service with a very welcoming smile. The staff are friendly and very helpful assisting us up to our hotel room. A very spacious and equipped room with everything you need. Location is brilliant, very near to dinning and local food, supermarket and very near to Changi airport. Will definitely recommend this place.

title: Friendly staff
desc: We had a nice room and enjoyed our stay. Convenienty located shopping centre nearby where we had a tasty shabu shabu supper..Quite near Changi Airport which is good when you travel a long distance, both when you come and go.

title: Tracy
desc: Clean & convenient Near mtr station Nice Supermarket near 🏨 hotel Great location, beautiful surrounding atmosphere, great staff. Most friendly and helpful receptionist and staff ever, lovely and great first impression of hotel. Everything about the hotel is ok. Room itself was well equipped and comfortable. I was very pleased with my stay. I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

title: Top Hotel
desc: A very awesome staycation experienced with our family having visited by our eldest son who we had never seen for almost 3years. Kudos to Mr Kamal who rendered excellent customer service with a very welcoming smile. The staff are friendly and very helpful assisting us up to our hotel room. Will definitely recommend this place.

title: Super hotel but no hot water??
desc: I was very happy with the hotel location, rooms, staff but if you stay for 1 night and dont have hot water at 5am before your flight - kinda was pointless. hope they fix this issue as the property was really clean and friendly

title: Helpful staffs
desc: The staffs (mr.faiz, ms. lin khing) here are very friendly & helpful! They gave the best service to us even at odd hours. My kids has been feeling under the weather, and causing so much issues (ie: vomitting, spilled water, messy rooms, etc.)

title: Good location but a few problems
desc: The hotel is very convenient for the airport and Changi business park. The location is right across the road from the Metro station and adjacent to a new mall with lots of good shops and restaurants. The rooms are set up for an extended stay, with a washing machine and cooking rings, and they are fairly spacious. However a few details left me unhappy. The biggest is that the self-closing door didn’t lock reliably, so I came back from work to find that it had been unlocked all day. There isn’t really a work space in the room, so I set up my computer on the kitchen table, which has rather poor lighting. I asked about detergent for the washing machine and the front desk told me housekeeping would drop some off in my room. They did - but only after the fourth time I asked. Overall,

title: PARK AVENUE CHANGI ACCOMODATING STAFF
desc: OUR STAY IS VERY GOOD. NICE AND CLEAN HOTEL. THE STAFFS ARE ALL FRIENDLY AND ACCOMMODATING MOST SPEACIALLY SIR FAZ. WE WILL SURELY GO BACK AND RECOMMEND THIS TO OUR FRIENDS. THANK YOU SO MUCH PARK AVENUE CHANGI FOR THE GREAT EXPERIENCE.

title: Good location, near airport and convention centre
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 1 night as a overnight stop in Singapore. We chose it based on its location to Changi airport. It's located in the business district. The check in was smooth and fast. The room was more a studio apartment than a hotel room which was great. The bed/pillows were not so good, every movement was felt so if you're a light sleeper you'll be woken. The pillows are super firm. There are few eating options around the hotel and they close early, 10pm. There's a supermarket 2 mins walk away and the convention centre is located next door.

title: Very convenient hotel for the expo and airport, lots of good food nearby.
desc: Very convenient hotel for the expo and airport, lots of good food nearby. Clean and fresh. Special thanks to the helpful staff like Faiz who look to go the extra mile. The pool is great and essential for Singapore! Will stay again here.

title: Very happy experience and will stay again
desc: Stayed at Park Avenue Change as a family for 4 (2 adult and 2 toddlers) a few days back. Upon arrival, we were welcomed by very friendly and accomodating staff. We requested for early checkin and very late checkout (as we had a midnight flight the next day) and was granted upon checking there were availability. On other times, various staffer on duty assisted with various questions and complicated transport bookings. The executive suite we lived were very spacious and clean. Beds are also very comfortable. Various utilities are another plus when staying as a family. The only downside was the lighting as some areas of the rooms were dark at times but I think its to setup the mood. Overall, I am very pleased and will surely return when I am passing through Singapore.

title: so-so
desc: It was time to check out, there was no one at the front desk and we were kept waiting for 10 minutes with no one to help us. And when they came back more than 10 minutes later, they did not apologize to us at all.

title: Carpark charge apply to its hotel guests
desc: There are no complementary carpark in this hotel, $3.50 charge applied. Reception staff informed me when I check in, no choice but just pay for the car park entry charge which is abnormal in hotel practice .

title: Comfortable and functional
desc: The room has separate areas for relaxation and work. There is enough space for two persons to do some computer work. A little extra lighting will be useful in the sitting area. Altogether a satisfactory stay.

title: Super convenient and a great stay
desc: The hotel is only one quick stop on the airport train away from Changi, and significantly cheaper than the airport hotels. We had a great stay here, our booked rooms were full, so we had a free upgrade. Our flight was at 9pm the next day, and the hotel gave us a late checkout at no extra cost which made it so easy and convenient to check out Singapore for the day. We were very happy staying here. It was clean and modern with everything we could want for an overnight stay.

title: Poor service and experience
desc: Check in and check out by bad staff attitude. Check in with wrong type of room and refuse to give refund for their error. Push away their fault. Was told that my booking was done by Trip.com thus I have to settle with Trip.com myself. Hotel dont even bother to inform Trip.com on their error.

title: Hotel
desc: Very easy and comfortable transports via MRT Feel-liked hotel in outlet shopping mall...just walk..can find anything what you want, can stay with alls lifestyle. Not too busy area to keep private style.

title: Good hotel room, despite being further from the city
desc: I stayed at 2 different hotels in my trip to Singapore and this was definitely the superior hotel. The room itself was unmatch and it was very comfortable. The only downside is that it’s about an hour away from downtown, but the train is close by, so it wasn’t hard to get down to town when we wanted to do so. Will definitely return here.

title: The location is good, my experience was not
desc: Went for a event at Expo, so booked this hotel to be closer. Stay was plagued with multiple issues - toilet leaking caused a dripping sound all night, technician who fixed the toilet walked around with his shoes on, the wardrobe door couldn't close, multiple lights stayed on with no switch working to turn them off, only one room card (which was deactivated when I got a second room card for a friend, so only one room card worked at any one time), no knowledge of updated checkout dates, the elevator lift goes to my floor but doors don't open. I made many trips to reception, and would not want to repeat this experience.

title: Great Location
desc: Due to a very early flight out of Changi Airport, my wife & I stayed one night at Park Avenue Changi. Its about 10-15 minutes by cab to the airport! Booked hotel through Wotif and check in was quick and easy. Upgraded room was large and clean. Excellent food and shopping are only a walking distance away from the hotel. MRT train station is also walking distance. Reception staff got me a cab at 5:00am and was at the airport by 5:15am! Will stay at this hotel again.

title: Like a Plush Condo Unit!
desc: It is like a Plush Condo Unit as you enter the room. All amenities that you need in your room are all there except for one thing- a Toilet Bidet! I just hope that the Management will install one and everything else will be fantastic!

title: A++
desc: I am glad that I found this hotel. Very clean, new, and friendly staff. Hotel room has everything, including a washer/dryer, and a toaster! Close to Changi Airport, easier choice for layover. Close to Pasir Ris. Walking distance to MRT. About 20 min to Orchard. Good hotel to be considered.

title: 3 Star Hotel at best
desc: Small rooms Dated bathroom with poor shower design (a roller blind in the shower which causes water to pool around the side of the bath and then leak onto the floor if not careful) Only one USB port on one side of bed Location is convenient. Supermarket and MRT just outside and shopping mall a two minute walk.

title: AWFUL
desc: My experience was NONE! Your hotel and your franchise has stolen my money. We booked 1 nite due to a cancellation of our Singapore London flight, so all the passengers rushed to book hotels for overnite, then the airline put us a hotel, and when I called to cancel the booking since it was a special situation your hotel denied 10 times to cancel and took my money, even not putting a foot on it. This has just one name ROBBERY

title: Clean and close to airport
desc: Ok hotel for a one-night stay. Room was clean, close to the airport and within walking distance to a mall w. fast food options. Obviously quite far from the city, if that's what you're after. Pool looked nice and clean, lobby was a bit messy and looked like a budget hotel, which was a shame.

title: Very good experience
desc: Good location (2mins from Expo MRT station--blue and green line ).There are some shopping malls and restaurants near Hotel. Front desk very kindly and helpful. If visit singapore,that's a good choice.

title: Decent Hotel near Changi, but loud AirCon
desc: After 13 hour flight we needed place to sleep overnight close to Changi airport. There is one hotel connected to airport but prices are too high for retired couple. This hotel was approx. 120 euros a night (no breakfast). Next from hotel are many restaurants to enjoy. We tried Indian and went to sleep very happy. AirCon machine was very loud and I could not make it silent except taking the key card away.

title: A good experience
desc: Nice and friendly stuff , ideal for arrivals in Singapore , one stop on underground. Helpful in every situation . Quiet and clean air conditioned rooms with lots of space . Nice late departure time at 11 am .

title: Good service and friendly staff but some expensive food system that is breakfast and dinner something
desc: Good service and friendly staff but some expensive food system that is breakfast and dinner something. Located in nearby expo where is best place to me. Because I have to exhibit this show that is CommunicAsia

title: Average or below average hotel
desc: Room was outdated and needs maintenance. Windows could not be opened in the room (not openable window). We booked 2 beedroom suite with "free breakfast included" but when we got to hotel only one breakfast was included and other person needed to pay 25 S$ to have breakfast also. On the other hand staff has been professional and helpful. Location is great if you are not staying long as it is close to the airport. Subway is also really close.

title: operators don’t pick up calls
desc: Wifi don’t work Long time to check in Operators don’t pick up call No room service Wifi can’t connect Tv channel keep lagging No ice serve to room Reception only 1 pax at night Phone will never be picked up by counter

title: A conference at the Expo centre
desc: The hotel is modern clean and comfortable with large well equipped rooms. It is a 10 minute walk from the Expo centre and close to the Metro. The staff are friendly and helpful. The breakfast was quite good. The hotel is good value.

title: Away from the hustle and bustle
desc: Located near the world's famous Changi Airport, Park Avenue Changi is indeed a destination if you and family need to get away from the city life. You will definitely experience the quiet ambience when you stay at Park Avenue Changi during the weekend. Surrounded by food alleys, you will be spoilt for choices. What's more, if you do run out of choices, there are other choices like Changi Airport (you can hop on from Expo MRT Station - a stone's throw away from the hotel) and Simpang Bedok. Park Avenue Changi is definitely the choice for families to get away from the hustle and bustle of life.

title: Good transit hotel close to Changi airport
desc: Only one MRT stop from airport, very close to MRT station, very convenient. Bathroom full of natural light thanks to clever glass wall. Large choice of standard food in the nearby shopping mall, nothing fancy though.

title: Transit night in Singapore
desc: The hotel is just a few minutes' walk from Changi station, 10 - minutes' drive from the airport. A shopping mall, a supermarket, cafes and restaurants are all nearby. We had a beautiful room, cosy and clean; with everything we needed and more (e.g. weighing scale in the bathroom). Nice roof top swimming pool. No bathroom for the guests waiting in the lobby. The suggested alternative "Burger King public toilet" is not for everyone.

title: Great Location, great Staff, great Hotel
desc: I absolutely recommend it! Friendly Staff, clean rooms, perfect location. Metro 3 minutes distance. Shopping Center and Restaurants right on the spot. Expo was right behind. I will most surely come back!

title: Zero service standard, rude front desk staff
desc: Rude front desk guy, couldn't check in at stated time, was told off to go get something to eat or wander around and come back after an hour; card key didn't work, had problem getting an extra card key, room smelled, no bathrobe though website stated there is

title: 1 night transit at Changi
desc: The hotel location only 8 minute (one MRT stop) from Changi airport MRT Station, and located right above the MRT Expo Station enterance. Since the hotel is inside the Expo complex, it was surrounded by some great restaurant, Burger King located at the 1st floor of the hotel building, and there are food alley with Japanese, Indian, or Local menu restaurant. Unfortunately it was closed at 9.30 pm. What was very nice, is Fair Price Supermarket also located in the complex, so we can buy any needs, and also food and drink from vending machine. Room was very spacious compared to other hotels in Singapore, aminities sre complete, surrounding area are not too busy, so we can take a walk or run early in the morning with no interference from vehicle or motorbike Although no beed to

title: Good location
desc: Near expo Mrt and shopping mall, I booked one twins bed room , but the room is quite small, bed also small , swimming pool only can fit 1 person to swim , gym room is good enough for me , btw , very good location.

title: GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF GUEST NEEDS
desc: Cammi the staff is good. Hotel understands businees traveler needs to sometimes need to check in early to have virtual meetings and also late checkouts after attending event at EXPO HALL 5 SG! Well done PACHANGI

title: Amazing service
desc: My connecting flight will take at least 9 hours and I don't want in the airport for 9 hours....decided to stay overnight at the Park Avenue Changi to catch my flight next flight to Philippines with my wife and my son. Even though previous guest left some negative feedbacks but i still took the challenge to try this hotel, guess what, I was impressed with the service standard given by the staff Barathi and Priya at reception. Both of them gone extra mile to serve the guest and their needs. I felt home while stying at Park Avenue Changi. I am returning again to Singapore and decided to stay in the same hotel because of the service and the friendliness of the staff. The rooms are clean and well kept. I would definitely recommend Park Avenue Changi for all categories of

title: HOTEL cancelled our booking due to CLOSURE
desc: Hotel cancelled our booking a month before. Booked in advance at June for a stay on December. Planned far away for cheaper price. Months goes by the hotel still open for reservation for december date. And did not inform guest about closure during december. Even their website and instagram do not say so. Try to contact them to confirm my reservation through email but no reply. Then I contact their instagram and just received reply days later. Afterwards the early november, their reservation team saying that they cant confirm my reservation because I booked through 3rd party apps. Then I go check with the 3rd party travel apps and they are saying my booking is fine and already registered on the systems. Just a week then i received email from the 3rd apps saying that the hotel is

title: HelenYL
desc: Great service provided by Zura and all the team there - making sure my request and questions are addressed and answered with solutions. The hotel is clean and quiet and I enjoyed my stay very much. Thank you !

title: Fantastic service by Zura and her team
desc: Had to adjust my travel to Singapore urgently and ended up at Park Avenue Changi hotel . At the last minute I ended up with a room that was clean and comfortable. Zura assisted me with everything especially in room dining, and was fantastic. She made sure I received the meals I asked for and provided 5 star service! Thanks to Zura for a great stay!

title: Park Avenue Changi
desc: The hotel is nice and clean, clean kettle and hair dryer available in the room. My stay was pleasant with all the helpful and friendly staff. So close to everything including food court, LRT, supermarket, clinic and a small shopping centre, all within a short walk. Indian breakfast and vegetarian lunch right next to the hotel.

title: Hotel does not honour bookings - AVOID
desc: I booked this hotel back in April for 1 night in September. I have a flight from London and am then going to Brisbane the next day, so this was the most convenient option. In June it emailed me to ask me to cancel my booking because it said it was not taking bookings for a certain period and was turning the hotel over to the local government. I did not cancel - why should I? The price of other hotels has gone up and if the hotel wants to cancel it should do so, not ask me to. I guess it is trying to avoid a negative impact with booking partners, but that is not acceptable. Essentially it is saying that it does not want to honour my confirmed booking but it wants me to be the party at fault. I declined to cancel and received another message on 19 July saying the hotel requested

title: Recommend to Stay
desc: Thank you for the excellent experience in the hotel. The room is clean, and the amenities is good for a long stay. Staff Shafie was a great help to help me with connections to Wifi providing a extra mile of service. The room cleaning lady was friendly and insisted to help me replace the towel and make my room even though I rejected politely. Kudos to it! I will definitely come back again !

title: Impeccable Service from Gaylen
desc: My partner and I planned a staycation at the property- primarily based on its location as we live in the east. Upon arrival- we noticed it was seemingly quite a busy check-in period and so we anticipated having to wait for sometime. However, Gaylen made our process extremely seamless and convenient. What stood out about him was his ability to make guests feel comfortable by striking conversations and just generally emanating a really positive energy. He kept us informed about the process every step of the way, made us feel really comfortable and it set the tone for a really pleasant stay. Kudos to him. Having stayed in at least 20 different hotels in Singapore, I must say this was one of the best service experiences I've had from an individual staff member. On the hotel itself-

title: Our one night booking for June 15 was cancelled without reason
desc: The whole point of booking early in March was to secure a room as we are transiting after a long flight. In early May, our booking was cancelled and we were offered an alternate sister, Park Avenue hotel which is 30 MINUTES by taxi. Since we will have an early morning flight out at 6:00 am, we cannot move to a hotel far away from the airport. It is very inconvenient and we had to do a new booking to a different hotel CAPRI By FRASER near the airport. This is very rude and very risky to book this hotel for transit as they will cancel your hotel reservation. I tried to call them a few times, but no one bothered to answer my calls. My sister was fortunate and her room was not cancelled. I suspect they are over booked and now randomly cancelling people in June as PCR test is no

title: Not bad at all
desc: Had a weekend staycation by booking a superior room and a 1 bedroom suite. Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable. The only downside was that the access to pool was quite inconvenient - have to trouble the staff to access level 10, where the gym and pool was. We were also given one access card per room to be shared amongst a few of us. That really caused us quite some time to meet each other at the ground floor before going to either rooms which were not on the same floor. As the cards were not differentiated with labellings of the room number, there were a few times we couldn't get to the right level as each card was level restricted.We had to also get help to reconfigure the cards twice as either the card was faulty or the lift was just too sensitive, haha. Luckily,

title: Booking cancelled without reason
desc: My hotel stay was booked mid March, I later received an email end of March asking if I could cancel it. I didn’t respond as I wanted to keep the booking (as per their instructions). I then found out when I landed in Singapore that my hotel stay was cancelled. Luckily for us the stay was at the end of the trip, not the beginning, so hopefully we can find somewhere to stay.

title: Slow check in struggles; good value for money
desc: Some operational struggles at the moment with long check in queues and rooms not behind ready for check in. I was fortunate to receive my room eventually 1.5 hours later but the queue did not abate till 8+ that night. Rooms are good and clean and facilities all work as expected, nothing too amazing about anything but nothing to complain about either. Good value for money.

title: Absolutely lovely stay
desc: Hassle free check-in! They gave us a free upgrade to a suite as the deluxe king room which we booked was not ready. Such a convenient environment with a lot of food choices and a NTUC right opposite. Front desk staff were very friendly and worked fast. 10/10 would recommend and will definitely come back! Thank you!

title: worst check in experience
desc: review written on 26/2/2022. i am actually at the hotel. reached at 3 plus pm. there was a long queue. regostered at 4.30pm. mentioned no room and to wait. up till 11pm 26/2/2022 there is no room. when asked, they do not know what time the rooms would be ready

title: Hotel cancelled my reservation without any reason.
desc: Booked this hotel for a one night stay and now, when hotel prices have gone up and availability has gone down, they canceled on me without any given reason. My guess is that they overbooked and are now canceling some bookings. Would advise not to book unless you want to run the risk of cancellation.

title: Wonderful service
desc: Thank you to Athi so the upgrade room appreciate your generosity as I was celebrating my anniversary on that day. Very fast and detailed check in. And also to shafie who helped me with the lift such a wonderful service from all of the people there would come back again to chill and relax. Thank you of you

title: Highly recommended
desc: Zura checked me into Park Avenue Changi. They are very flexible in terms of the length that I am staying in as I do not have a definite check out date (short-term). They have also upgraded my room into a suite which was really spacious. The suite is well equipped with utensils, washing machine (very handy), fridge and stove. It was a shame that on my last day of my stay the government has to activate them as a quarantine hotel. However they were very nice to provide me taxi to their hotel in Rochester and also a cab ride to the airport the next day as Rochester is very far from Changi Airport (which was the reason I chose Park Avenue Changi). I will always go back to them on my stay in Singapore.

title: Great Service
desc: It wonderful to came back to singapore, book a hotel near to the airport. Great service by the Shafie to carry my luggage from check in to check out, nice hotel after been closed due to covid 19. Once again thank you for the awsome service by the hotel personnel.

title: Weekend Staycation (Fri-Sat)
desc: We received a complimentary upgrade for a weekend staycation. No problems with the suite, excellent condition. Bathtub is standard for all room types. The LG washing machine/dryer is very convenient. Knives, pot, and a stove is provided, although we did not cook. Two TVs -- living room and bedroom. MRT subway, shopping mall, business park and convention centre is nearby.

title: Perfect staycation
desc: Park avenue changi was perfect to have a one night staycation. Would have loved to stay a bit longer. Near to mrt, shopping mall and supermarket right below the hotel. Everything was clean n rooms were comfortable. We had an issue with choked floor trap which caused our bathroom floor to be flooded. We alerted the front desk when we were out for dinner. A couple of hours later, we came back to a clean bathroom and choke was resolved. Front desk staff were good and housekeeping were very friendly. Got an upgrade to the suite to which we were more than willing to pay, but probably bacause staff saw that it was the birthday of my spouse when she checked the ID, we had it free! Would love to come back and was planning to have a long term stay however as they will be converting

title: Pleasant SHN stay
desc: My 14days SHN stay has been a pleasant & one. or open window for some fresh air. The Duty Manager, Ms Zura must have sensed my anxiety and offered to upgrade me to a suite. This made the world of difference to me as the suite comes with kitchenette, microwave and washing machine! So relieved that I was not confined to a small room. I could also heat up my food as my meal timings are later than the meal delivery timings. Ms Zura was kind to call to check on me during my stay. She has been very helpful in answerring my queries and requests. Overall, good and prompt service rendered by the front desk and housekeeping staff. Thank you for making my stay a good experience. 😊

title: Great Hotel & Awesome Efficient Services
desc: My humble appreciation for the efficient & prompt services by Ms Zura & Mr Shafie. Our rooms which has some maintainance issues was attended to immediately by both Ms Zura & Mr Shafie. Customers comfort & safety is their utmost priority. Great rooms, superb service & most convenient location of the hotel.

title: Best Service Goes To Masmira!
desc: Subject: Compliments on your wonderful service Dear Masmira, It was a wonderful experience staying Park Ave Changi as well as dealing with my experience on the wifi issue. I would like to extend my heartiest compliments to you for the Best Service attended I ever had. Your professional attitude of dealing with your guest deserves appreciation. I once again would like to thank you for giving me such a wonderful workcation experience. Wish you all the Best for future.

title: Shn notice
desc: I have stayed in this hotel for my shn . The staff are really kind specially Zura, the Duty manager that made everything to help me during this hard period. Thanks again and a lot for all the services and help you provided.

title: Best Customer Service at Park Avenue
desc: Nice room.. Good location.. Thank you to Zura from front desk for making our stay pleasurable and unforgettable... Zura deserve the recognition... And not to forget Arty also...both of them their service is genuine and really made our stay pleasurable... Thank you

title: SHN 14 Days Experience
desc: Serving my SHN at Park Avenue Changi was interesting and wonderful. The staffs (front desk, duty managers, housekeeping etc.) at the hotel are friendly and helpful. I only can name Zura and Stanley as I did not ask the names of the others but most of them are really nice. Being a “demanding” customer, they tried their best to fulfil all my requests (daily meals menu, special meal request, additional toiletries, extra chair etc.) and patiently answered all my queries. I called them almost everyday and they never turn me down. These really made my days as being alone in the hotel room for 14 days can be quite boring and talking to them cheered me up. The only downsides are, the WiFi didn’t work well during my 2nd week and the food served does not follow the menu (except for

title: Pleasant Eight Night Stay
desc: Booked the Deluxe Room and checked in on a Friday at about 11am. Pleasantly surprised that the room was ready. Got a corner room on level 9. The room was well maintained, had a comfortable work desk which was important to me. The bathroom came with a bathtub. The bed and pillow was very comfortable. Only complain was that the air-conditioning wasn't cold. Tried to the front desk that night but couldn't get through to them. I informed the front desk the next evening, but told them to send the technician in the day. However, it did feel better the that night hence I cancelled request for the technician to check on the air conditioning. However, the next day, it was back to its old self. The front desk team promptly got the technician to check on it and was advised to change a

title: Excellent Stay SHN
desc: I have been very happy to stay at Park Avenue Changi Hotel for 14 days due to quarantine requirements. The hotel was very good, clean, , nice bed and living room and with complete facilities like small kitchen and washing machine etc, and I was lucky enough to get a room facing the Singapore Expo and the main road, at least reducing my stress during my lock up for 2 weeks. All the staff were very helpfull and particularly Mr Muthalip Azhar were very helpful and provided professional service. He has done extra mile in serving customer and he would be a great talent to be promoted. The hotel is also convenient as located near mall etc. I definitely return to this hotel.

title: Nice five star hotel in the east of Singapore.
desc: I stayed in this hotel for a week. the room looks pretty new. Shampoo and body wash given in the baths are pretty nice. The 1 bedroom suite comes with washing machine and induction cooker. Gaylen and his team deliver excellent customer service. They are excellent staffs who helps to deliver grab food to my room when I wasn't well. Special thanks to Gaylen ! Gaylen has exhibited warmth, passion, empathy and professionalism in his job. He is definitely an asset to the hotel and he brings a smile to his guests.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: My pshn stay was wonderfully, food was nice. The staff muthalip, azhar, atthi was friendly.their service is good.they assist me when ever I need help. I'll be back to the hotel for the staff Muthalip bellman.

title: Warm service and ambiance
desc: The service has met our expectations w the help of Mr. Stanley Ho. Ms Winnie from housekeeping was very attentive to our needs too. The room was clean & neat. More power to all of u serving as frontliners during this time of COVID. God bless u all

title: Good stay and service during SHN
desc: Had a great stay during my 14 day quarantine! Good service staff - especially Muthali Bellman! Always greeting with a smile and a good conversation. Food was a good, and housekeeping was quick with any requests

title: The Bell man Mutalip and other services and staff
desc: I came to the hotel with my 85 yrs old mom.. we stayed in the family sweet which was very comfortable . When I first came to the hotel, I felt very lost and just wanted to leave .. but gradually as I was there my stay was made very comfortable and the service I got from Mutalip was too good to be true, He went way beyond my expectations and is great asset to your hotel team. , whatever we wanted he would go out of the way to do things for us which is very rare now days ... even when he was on leave he would still go all out to make sure we got everything we wanted and never made us feel out of place.. This kind of service is very rare. All the other staff tried to make us feel comfortable as well. But Multalip was the best...... we had a great experience.. Thank You Park

title: Kudos to 3 employees at Park Ave, Changi - 14 days Quarantine
desc: No one wants to go through a 14 day quarantine by choice but more out of pressing needs or for compelling reasons! I went through a 14 day of mental 'torture' of many worries, stresses and financial needs! But I was also lucky and fortunate as 3 employees brought a ray of sunshine and certainly alleviate my stresses and headaches! Gaylen Tan was always very patient and sincere and I can hear it from the tone of his voice as he shared professional advice to ensure that my stay becomes a more relaxing one! Devi is another front office Supervisor who was always cheerful in her conversations with guest; always sincere and made me feel more relaxed. She is the type of employee who has a way to cheer up a troubled guest like me! Lastly, Winnie Chng is a wonderful employee

title: Appretion for good hospitality
desc: To hotel staff, I can not say thank you enough for your hospitality. The way Muthalip (bellman) is helping that is outstanding.Front office also always ready to help and answer all our questions.” Thank u so much all Regards Rupali

title: A Great Thanks To Park Avenue Changi Team!!
desc: My family and I stay at Park Avenue Changi Hotel for 14 days due to quarantine requirements.Mr Muthalip been significant helpful and providing professional service.Thanks to Duty Manager Zura for getting the cake for my kid birthday celebration.It was splendid.Muthalip was so kind to bring the cake and chocolates for my kids birthday.I was amazed by Muthalip extra mile service.My next compliment is to Lina +from Front Desk who answered my call politely and helpful.I will recommend to my friends and family to come to this hotel in future as Muthalip service was excellent and 5* standards.It was great experience for me and my family.Great thanks to all staff.Thumbs up!!

title: Excellent Staffs
desc: Was allocated to this fabulous hotel for my 14days SHN. Everything is well organized. Room is comfortable. Staffs are always smiling and ready to lend a helping hand. Shout out a big thank you to muscle man bellman, Mr Muthalip, with my 4 huge luggages and all other hard working staffs that made this 14days easy.

title: SHN
desc: Special thanks to Muthalip, the bellman, for his investigation to find back the package that had been by the delivery man. The hotel was good, clean, no noise, nice bed, enough room for a SHN. That's it!

title: I love this to girls who is a receptionist toward the hotel
desc: I was having a hard time to find food despite having room service because room service are much expensive than the normal ones.. So Ashley and Zura offered a grabfoob as an option by using their utilities... They are so humble and kind offering choice to have food service in a easier way... Thank you to Ashley and Zura.... With them I'm able to have a great time and a good service whenever I needed at that point of time... Without them, I don't think I might have what I want on that night.

title: Thank you Muthalip, Siti, Zuva, Eleen, and Azhar for your excellent hospitality!
desc: My family and I are staying in Park Avenue Changi hotel as part of Stay Home Notice issued by Singapore government. So far, we have a great experience in the hotel. The staff who attended to our calls are friendly and responsive, and

title: Very good & Caring Staff
desc: The hotel facility is moderate 3-4 star but has excellent staff. During my two weeks of quarantine, the hotel staff did every possible efforts to make stay comfortable (its really not easy during covid). Mr. Muthalip bin Ramathulla & Mr. Charles took extra efforts in ensuring my food was good & ensured that I am fully satisfied. The hotel has extremely caring & nice staff. Highly recommend to stay (with out without quarantine) 😊

title: Convenient business location, attentive staff, good facilities
desc: If you have business in Changi, this is a great place to stay in. Within walking distance is Changi City Point Mall with lots of eating choices, a restaurant strip, and a grocery. It's also right beside the MRT station for EW and Downtown lines -- a station away from the airport and Jewel Changi. Staff were very friendly and attentive. Responsive to requests. Rooms are always clean. The stove top and washing machine are easy to use and good quality brands. My only two points for improvement would be: 1) rooms can tend to feel a bit dark as my walls were dark brown all around; 2) TV is quite dated -- doesnt have the usual apps (i.e. Netflix, etc) and doesnt recognize external drives. But other than that, highly recommended.

title: Best Bellboy, Mr Muthalip
desc: I am serving my 14 days quarantine from 31 Dec 2020 to 14 Jan 2021, hopefully. Firstly, I would like to thank the hotel for handling the stays. I was given a clean, neat and bright room on the 9th floor. It is thus far impressive experiences especially well taken care off by Mr Muthalip, the bellboy, must be one of the best employees from the hotel. He helps as much as he could to make my quarantine very pleasant- from retrieving my lost luggage to speedily delivering meals and taking feedbacks seriously. Thanks once again to all the staff. I would definitely recommend this hotel for holiday!

title: Very Disappointing
desc: Very disappointing. I am here to work and need a well functioning internet connection. But is frustrating how bad it is. Very low speed (average 3 MBit/s when it is actually working) and often no connection at all. I have called reception several times already about this, but it is not getting better.

title: A short break...
desc: We booked 2 nights on a separate booking without realising that both night room were different. Thanks to Front Office Ms Eleen who was so helpful to ensure that they would be no disruptions for our 2 night stay. Hospitality from hotel staffs was excellent and FnB outlets are within walking distances.

title: great room great service!
desc: Stayed here last year The room was very clean and it was primarily for short business trips. It was a lovely and amazing stay everything was just walking distance from the MTR to the outlet center and the offices. great hotel great location. Big shout out to Munthalip, who accommodated us for a quick shower beyond our checkout time as we wait for our flight towards the evening. very very good customer service

title: Review
desc: Accomodation is great and Mam Zura thanks to u for ur kindness....The food is not Good and i said i want to change my food to chinese as of now they serve western food ,iwant the food but everyday they serve no rice

title: Nice hotel
desc: Excellent service.muthalip bellmen Hu very nice hotel rekomen very chip price tuor help to my family good recommend tuor selling tickets Sentosa night safari and help others. I am glad that our team members have played a part in making your experience a memorable one. I will soon back to this hotel's,😊 Thanks.

title: Good job by Muthalip
desc: Warmest hospitality by Bellman Muthalip. He was very helpful during the check in process and went the extra mile by offering his assistance while our stay there. Keep up the great work and looking forward to our next stay there.

title: Perfect and warm welcoming from the crew!
desc: I have spent 2 weeks in a room in this hotel, the crew was very welcoming and always at our service. My room was clean and functional. Special mention to the nicest bellman I have ever met, Mr Muthalip, who even bought me an ice-cream to help me get through the Stay-Home Notice ! :D

title: Nice stay, convenient..👏
desc: My family travel visit Singapore for 3 days. The Park Avenue is very easy to go by subway exit the Expo station or cab. Inside triple room is 2 connected room, sink , utensils, microwave and washing machine are available. The swimming ,gyms and business conf room located in the top of building which you can see nice scene of Changi area. The fair price is closed to, seasonal fruits as kiwi are right there. The outlet for clothes , sports shoes are also easy to see in 10 minutes by walk.

title: Park avenue changi....... awesome.
desc: I would like to share my experiences which I recently had in park avenue hotel located in Singapore at Changi. We had a lovely , amazing experience and a awesome food & very clean all places.... like Even SECURITY staffs and MUTHALIP BELLMAN cooperated very well n guides us n received us with a great smile 😃 ... also speak nicely thanks for really helpful person Muthalip excellent fast service.hotel had best service man... Thank you so much for all the staff in park avenue Changi.

title: Fantastic SHN
desc: Beautiful Hotel with a very attentive staff. The room was very good : large, bright and comfortable. The staff was really exceptional, very attentive and smiling. I would especially like to thank Mr. Muthalip Bellman who was a great comfort during this period of mandatory confinement (SHN). Thank you to him for his smile and kindness!

title: Comfortable stay!
desc: Small and cosy place during transition to Singapore! Right next to a mall. Thanks Muthalip for helping me and the reception staff for answering basic questions. Really enjoyed the stay and hospitality.

title: Convenient location and friendly staff
desc: Great service, the location was perfect for shopping at the nearby outlet centre and the service was great, from the front of house staff to, in particular the concierge Kumar who assisted us with all of our needs.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Excellent service and personnel, at our requests we received professional feedbacks. We really recommend this structure and next time we go to Singapore we'll stay for sure in this hotel, we can recommend it 100%

title: Great Service
desc: Was not informed of the parking charges when i called to enquire, Zura was great, she looked into the matter and did a refund to me. She was so professional and friendly. Impressive personality. Nice, clean and cozy stay. Will be back.

title: Couldn't Care Less About Customers Situation.
desc: Booked hotel overnight after our cruise ended in Singapore. Our cruise was cancelled due to the Corona Virus and despite three weeks notice would not accept our cancellation and charged us in full. Both we and booking.com made repeated requests but they couldn't have cared less about the circumstances that were beyond our control. Thing long and hard before booking this property.

title: Excellent hospitality!
desc: I have stayed in Park Avenue Changi not on just one occasion but almost every for every trip I make. It's proximity to my workplace and amenities located around the hotel makes it very convenient. Hotel staff were exceptionally well-trained and are willing to go the extra mile to ensure your stay is taken cared of. This is especially true for one particular staff Zura, Front Office Manager of Park Avenue Changi who has never disappoint me in any of my stay. She puts in upon herself to ensure your bookings and stay are all perfect. Well done Zura!

title: Adequate and convenient for conference centre
desc: Good hotel for stop over hotel or for conference. Large rooms though not sure who ever wanted see through window into toilet and baithroom. A bit un interesting for a longer stay with un inspiring and not cheap restaurant

title: Great location and wonderful service.
desc: very nice facility and good service. Good bathroom setting and very hot water. Your staff, Muthalip Bellonan, was very kind and even helped me to park the car in the basement. In addition, he showed me the way to Expo convention center and shopping mall.

title: Great location
desc: Just over the road from the MRT station, hotel was lovely, staff very friendly and helpful. The room was lovely, beds comfy, it has a swimming pool on the rooftop, only small but it does the trick, lots of places close by to eat. Taxis from the airport (unless it’s rush hour) are very reasonable,

title: Good Stay and Not Far from the Airport
desc: We got in after midnight and got a cab to this hotel and surprisingly a bus tour had arrived just ahead of us. Fortunately, a nice person checked us in separately so we didn't have to wait until the bus load was checked in. We enjoyed the room, but there was mold on the grout around the tub which was odd for a nice hotel. I'm sure they'll fix that.

title: Staycation @Park Avenue Changi Hotel
desc: The air con in suite 605 did not work. After 3 calls, i got a change to suite 606. The TV in suite 606 did not work but the problem was resolved immediately after making a report to the reception. Overall, I enjoyed my starvation as the room is clean and cosy and well required with electrical appliances. The location is good with MRT station, many eateries and a shopping mall nearby. Thanks to the friendly and helpful staff at the reception.

title: Warm welcome after harrowing journey
desc: We needed a modern, clean hotel close to the airport and Park Avenue Changi fitted the bill perfectly. Having got stranded in Singapore at midnight after our standby flights were full and could not take us the hotel was just perfect. Bellboy Muthali and the two receptionists Ashloy and Elery were excellent and most helpful and took account of how tired we were.

title: Horrible Business. Horrible System.
desc: Horrible experience and would not recommend to anyone. They asked me for a security deposit upon check-in and was told clearly that It will be deposited back automatically to my account upon check-out. On top of that I cannot get a refund of the unused stay. I went to Singapore for a business trip to attend at an event and conference. I checked in on 11th Feb (Tue) and was supposed to stay for 3 nights . I was supposed to check-out on the 13th Feb (Fri). Due to unavoidable circumstance, I was asked by our company in Dubai to fly back ASAP due to coronavirus. As a result, I only stayed in the hotel for 1 night but they wont give me a refund for the remaining 2 days which I didnt use. I am back in Dubai and still havent got the security deposit which they took from my

title: worst
desc: worst hotel service i never seen ever and payment policy absolutely pathetic and no more flexible it's not good for corporate travelers am having one of the most terrible experience in my accommodation part i never suggest your property to anyone.

title: Superb Location with Fabulous Customer Service
desc: Located just one station next to Changi Airport/10mins drive. Perfect accessibility to convenient store-NTUC Fair Price & Changi City Mall. Amazed by their Fabulous customer service. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Warm welcomed by Ashley (super cute Malaysian lady) & not forget Devi (Singaporean Indian lady) whom never fail to provide the top-notch customer service! Enjoy staying here! 😍

title: Still holding payment
desc: I booked via booking.com with the option to pay on arrival (which we did), however the payment is still being held on the card I used to reserve the room on. It's now been 2 weeks. We paid in full on a different card so the hotel has no right to hold the balance. I've contacted booking.com and the hotel twice, not heard anything back. This is disgraceful customer service from the agent and hotel.

title: Great Hospitality
desc: As we walking into the hotel reception Saiful were very welcoming. He is such a pleasant person to speak to and he even show us some place to go to. The staff were nice and always smiling. The bed is very comfortable and clean. Had a wonderful stay with great hospitality. Will definitely stay again.

title: Friendly staff
desc: The bellman, Mr Muthalip was very helpful and friendly. He offered to help us carry lots of our stuffs without us asking for help. He was very attentive to our needs and was always there to help us out whenever we have any queries. And our kids love his antics and jokes! Thank you Mr Muthalip in making our stay a fun and enjoyable one!

title: Our honeymoon stay
desc: Hotel is comfortable and nice. Upon check in, Mr Jega help us to process the check in. He is very gentle and smile a lot. After coming back from sightseeing, i lost my keycard.i feel sorry abt it however mr ivan was very humble and issue us a new keycard and wish us have a good stay. Before i sleep, i request morning call and mr tim who answer it politely. Such a good customer service he had. I wish to come again to Singapore and hopefully can stay in this hotel.

title: Bad experience in booking this hotel.
desc: I had booked a night stay before my flight via expedia on park avenue changi on the 16th jan 2020. However, I made a mistake by booking a day after on the 18th jan which is the day of my business flight at 6am, hence I immediately called expedia on this request to change the date to 17th jan 2020. But to understand from expedia after his call to park avenue, the staff said he/she had no permission to do it and expedia can only email them to get back in 24hrs. Expedia knowing Within 24hrs Im already on plane, he encourage me to cancel the booking and said it could be refunded. I’m glad i made another booking in another hotel for the stay, because park avenue had get back late, im already on board. I was notified that its not refundable, oh well i paid for nothing. What a bad

title: Hotel service review
desc: Muthalip, the bell boy, was friendly and helpful :)) He helped us with our luggage and all our bags to carry down to the lobby. He was easy to talk to and made us feel at ease. The receptionist was also friendly. I had a pleasant stay.

title: Comfortable
desc: My stay was comfortable. The two-bed room was spacious. The basic amenities were included like drinking water, hair drier, flat iron etc. A bath tub was also in there. The toiletries were perfect for bathing and relaxing. The staff were nice and accommodating.

title: Excellent hotel and services
desc: Excellent hotel and services. Security, hospitality, house keeping, response from hotel staff are all excellent. One of the finest hotel I have visited in my life. Having swimming pool, Gym facilities also. Hope the hotel management will continue this quality services in future too

title: Great service by Muthalip, Bellman, Azhar
desc: Went for 3D2N at Park Avenue Changi hotel from 7Feb to 9Feb and I would like to express my sincere gratitude to these 3 (Muthalip, Bellman and Azhar) for being friendly and providing excellent service throughout our entire stay. Thank you! :)

title: 6 Week at Park Avenue
desc: Rooms: We stayed in a double bed Deluxe Room, space was just right not too big or too small. You can fit two people with luggage. Lighting could be better, if you choose to work in the evening and study. Housekeeping was done everyday and they have dedicated housekeepers per floor, shout out to Zhao Min for keeping our room tidy and neat for 6 weeks Breakfast was at the first floor, choices are limited to certain servings, and it feels almost repetitive if you stay for 6 weeks. The front desk staff are polite and very helpful. Aileen, Devi, Eileen, Ashley, Muthalip. They'll help you out just ask. Location, MRT Blue Downtown line and Green line from the airport is very accessible within 3 minutes walk. Changi City Point mall is right in front with the best deals you can buy

title: Singapore visit January 2020
desc: Well done, very satisfied with the our overall stay in Singapore. We would certainly come back again if we do return for another visit in the near future. Thank you and our best regards to all the folks at the front desk. Terima Kasi

title: Amazing Hotel right next to the airport
desc: Wonderful hotel at a great location.10 mins ride from the airport. Amazing facilities. Lot of Indian eating outlets nearby. The front desk staff including Ms. Zura and Ms. Elaine are simply superb. Gym is great , swimming pool is slightly small. Still,Cant ask for a better place to stay with office next door. Breakfast is simply awesome. whole lot of variety.Its a lovely hotel to stay in.

title: Changi Hotel
desc: Very confortable and clean rooms. I "d like to thank especially Zura at reception desk for her kindness and professional behavior.Thank you all. It was far from downtown center city but MRT station helped a lot!

title: Good value, clean place and strategic place
desc: the location is very strategic, near to Changi airport and Expo Mrt station. Great service by hotel staff , Devi and Muthalip. Fast check in procedure and They upgraded our room to bigger one. They allow us to keep our bags after check out so that i can go other place before going to Changi Airport. I will be back again to this hotel and recommend to friends and family.

title: Beautiful, very clean and quiet. Short taxi ride to Singapore international airport (5 minutes at night, 10 minutes in
desc: I stayed overnight when I missed a connection through Singapore. I loved this hotel. Extremely clean and quiet. Beautiful, elegant lobby. Very helpful staff. Edge of bathtub was quiet high so someone who is mobility challenged should request a shower if available. I didn't have time for a meal so I can't comment on the food. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Park Avenue Changi
desc: We stayed for one week and we loved Singapore. It was family vacations. The apartment was amazing.Very comfort and clean. Many thanks to very friendly and kind Zura to the reception office. She was helpful and really saved us! We will return back for sure

title: Wonderful experience at Park Avenue Changi
desc: Staff that checked us in was really nice and friendly. She assisted us with a quick check in and even upgraded our room for us:) it was hassle free and quick. Location of hotel was also good. Room is spacious and clean. Well-equipped with lots of kitchen items:) it is wonderful experience for me and my friends!

title: Great Stay
desc: hotel is very close to airport. Staff was very helpful and kind. Check in was very fast and smiling face. Really appreciate staying here and will be back. Thank you so much for a great service. Great and will recommend to friends.

title: Early Jan
desc: It was OK. I'm talk so tub was too small for me and couldn't fit to take a bath to relax while traveling. Nice quality technology TV and stuff. And I didnt like walking that far to and from thebl elevator.

title: Stopover
desc: Easy to get to, very accommodating of requests, clean, well-equipped, staff happy to help sort a taxi for an early morning check-in. As a solo traveller it was a quick walk from the metro station- turn right and cross the road to the side with the business park. It is also nearby Changi Point shopping mall if you want to fit some quick shopping in or try something a bit different to eat. Very close to Changi Airport, a breeze to get to by metro anytime after 0555hrs or by taxi otherwise. Second time I've stayed here, no complaints.

title: Good value, clean place to stay near the airport
desc: Receptionist is kind and agreed to keep our bags after check out so that we can freely visit Singapore the whole day. On the way back to retrieve bags, we were allowed to take shower at rooftop swimming pool! Good value and definitely preferable to price gouging hotels at airport. Again, many good restaurants in the mall next to our hotel and you will just need to look for them. And Expo MRT train station is next to the hotel.

title: Easy un complicated check in & Check out
desc: This hotel is perfect for quick transit stop overs I landed at 2:30 am and was impressed and happy that the check in staff had everything ready and took 5 mins to check me in. The concierge was very help full too. Room was clean and well maintained, comfortable beds and good amenities. Check out was a breeze too and again the concierge & bell man Mr Muthalip was very courteous & helpful. Good Job Guys keep it up

title: Park Avenue
desc: Customer Friendly staff extending flexibility and very prompt and responsive. Both booking and check in are very efficient. Rooms are compact and well Maintained. Excellent service overall. Close to all amenities.

title: A rare gem of a stay in the buisness hubs
desc: This hotel is like a rare known gem. It is located walking distance to the subway station which is one stop away from the airport! Imagine the money spent on taxi or grab and the congestion of traffic. Theoretically, it is tactically splendid. Nestled within the community of business hubs it provide the serenity satisfaction that you are here enjoying while people around you are working. The variety of food and though not much of merchandise at Changi City point is another splendid hit; similarly walking distance! Unbelievable location, the accommodation is tremendous, the staff are pleasant and on point. A rare gem of a place, found!

title: Great Stay
desc: Had a great 1 night stay here, staff was friendly and helpful, all accommodations provided for an affordable price. Bell Man Muthalip was especially helpful and friendly in helping us check out and arranging out ride back to the airport.

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: This hotel located in the middle of business district which is surprisingly convenient for the looking for dining and shopping! The shopping just on the other side of the hotel and lot of restaurants around the hotel as well. Very closed to the airport was the reason why did we chose to stay at the last day of our trip in Singapore. The bedroom is clean and big enough for the little one to walk around. The bathroom is absolutely stunning! My little one had fun inside the bathroom and brought us a lot of fun. I do really like the filter water system inside the bathroom which can help to reduce the usage of plastic water bottles. The swimming is clean and the view on the roof top is fantastic. We had a very good sleep before the flight. The only thing I would suggest which is

title: Mrs Singh
desc: Muthalip Bell man and Azahr were really helpful. Service was amazing and stay was great. Will come back again for staying. Handy to trains and shopping centre. Clean rooms with excellent communication

title: Very comfortable stay @ Park Avenue Hotel
desc: The hotel was very comfortable and clean. The complementory breakfast is so tasty. The Bell Boy named Muthalip was so much helpful for check in and check out times. He is so much friendly guy. I strongly recommend this hotel to other users. Thank you.

title: Best for business traveller
desc: I feel the location is good for business traveller if their client is around that area but for holiday traveller, it will take some time to go downtown or place of interest even though SG is small. The hotel has everything around it - MRT, outlet mall with many restaurants in it and supermarket just below the hotel. Overall, it is good and definitely will recommend for a short weekend getaway

title: Very Good Customer Service
desc: I was greeted by Ms Elene Tan during check in. She was very helpful. 5star with customer service. But im a bit disappointed with breakfast as it lacks of choices to eat and drink. Anyway room service was good. Room was good too. But the tv have only 1 channel for movie.

title: Good Location
desc: Room is clean and fantastic...Thanks to Front Desk staffs Azhar,Devi and Zura for their extra mile service, friendly and helpful.Location near mall easy access to get food.Overall i enjoyed my stay there..My family and i will come back again for our next staycation.

title: Short stop over in Singapore
desc: Excellent location and friendly and helpful service staff. Hotel is very near Changi airport and underground access to the nearest Expo MRT was so handy on rainy days when we checked in and out. Food and shopping was a few steps away too.

title: Uncomfortable & Unsafe Stay
desc: I checked in with very little help from the desk. I was simply handed a key and told "bye". The same day, I came back from walking downtown and noticed someone had been in my room. This was the same day as check in so it was NOT housekeeping. My windows were re-opened, my towel was gone (odd). I called and they said, "we let service men in". WHAT?!?! At least have the courteously to let me know first. I would have liked to lock up or conceal my belongings and feminine clothing. I'm very uncomfortable about this and the overall stay. To top it off, it was incredibly noisy and the beds were hard as rocks. NOT staying here again and I will be sure to inform others.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Love the room. Very spacious. We got upgraded actually. The staff are very helpful and I even asked one of them to show me the qibla direction for prayers. Devi and Mutthalip are really helpful. Near to fairprice to find food to cook in the kitchenette. Basic kitchen utensils are provided

title: Excellent service crew
desc: The hotel location is EXCELLENT with easy access to the MRT lines and the MALL. It is close to the Changi Airport too via the MRT line. We are here on holidays. Our stay here is for 11 days and needed to change room after one day due to the musty smell in the room. We approached the reception Ashley and without question she said yes and organized another colleague by the name of Kumar to come see the room. They then showed us a new room on a higher floor and we accepted it. The new room is nice and clean; no smell. These 2 staffs are excellent with a professional attitude and a friendly smile accommodating to our request. Do not loose these kind of staff. They are the "hidden value" to your hotel.

title: Jitendra kumar
desc: Muthalip is very generous and helping in nature . Once I time I locked in room he helped me to take me out . I request to management if you are going to promote someone so please do this for him . Regards Jitendra kumar Room no 611

title: Helpful Staff
desc: Ms Devi, the hotel receptionist is very helpful to us in our time of stay. Nice location. Near shopping malls. Big cosy room with kitchen and fridge. Nice restaurant. Great stay overall. Will come again. Thank you!

title: Business Trip
desc: Room is clean. AC is cool. New hotel. There is a scale to check your weights. Kumar Ashley are friemdly receptionist. Location is close to Expo MRT Station. And NTUC Express. Very close to Changi Airport only 10 mins ride. Available morning MRT starting 5am from Tanah Merah MRT to catch morning flight. Have complimentary umbrella for guests, it was raining and good to have umbrella.

title: Great Stay
desc: We stayed in this hotel as a part of Group of 225 people... Check in process was super smooth. The front officer manager managed to check in 100+ rooms by 2 pm. Bellman was more than happy to help us in each step of the way. Breakfast was superb with wide variety spread. Thanks for making our travel memorable. Specail mention Muthalip Bellman and FOM nice lady whose name I can't remember...

title: Nice
desc: The only problem was the late night music on the halls. Christmas musica the we could hear and make it really hard to fall a slepp. Non the less it was a amazing hotel. Clean, good staff and very well equipped. Ps: the swimming pool exists but man, it is little.

title: Good hotel
desc: I staid here for 1 month for work. Location is good. 1 station from the airport, next to a shopping mall, restaurants, supermarket, bars, expo and MRT. Quality good, cleanliness good, people good. Nothing to complain about.

title: Muthalip Bellman
desc: Nice room, very clean. The location is awesome with the mall and very close from Changi Airport and train station. Excellent service from Muthalip (Bellman) with storing our family luggage with 3 room at all and organizing our goods.I give him 10 star from 10 star for his service.Value for money and would choose it again in another trip to Singapore.

title: Good service
desc: - The cleaning is good. - Good communication is good - The staffs are friendly - I could sleep very well during my stay - I stayed with 6 nights but I could remember that one night a room closed to mine made some noise.

title: Convenient airport hotel
desc: Of the four 4-star hotels I used in Singapore on my latest tour, this place was my favourite. It is close to the airport (10min drive by taxi; 14 SGD to get there, 10 SGD to get back to the airport). Check-in was easy. I got a room on the 7th floor with nice views, but as usual the window didn't open. The bed was comfortable and I had a good sleep. There was all in the room I needed and the bathroom was well equipped. Couples might enjoy - or not - the fact that from the toilet seat one can look over the bathtub into the bedroom and out the window. For my late dinner I went to the attached 'Cali' restaurant for a quick bite and a drink. Breakfast, which was not included, is served there as well. To use the breakfast buffet I got a voucher from reception (value around 25 SGD).

title: Clean, good location
desc: Nice room, very clean. The location is awesome with the mall and subway station next door. Excellent service from bellman (Mathalip) with storing my luggage and organizing taxi.Value for money and less than 10 SGD to the airport via taxi. Would definitely stay again

title: quite comfortable stay
desc: It was quite comfortable stay as business trip except water pipe sounds at night. I will use this hotel for my next business trip where location was suitable for me to attend meeting near airport. Service was speedy and breakfast had a lot of choices.

title: Trip to ESTRO meets Asia 2019
desc: I booked 4 nights to stay 5 days in Singapore for the ESTRO meets Asia 2019. Your friendly personal suprised me frm the beginning ill the end. After i checked out they gabe me the possibility to take a shower at the evening befor i went to the airport. Thank you very much for this. The breakfest time from 6 till 10 is perfect. i could easely eat somkething before i went to the EXPO. I would prefer more change at the breakfast buffet. Unfortunately the selection has not changed much every day. in the rooms as well as in the cleaning staff there is nothing to complain about, but if there was a bit more activity in the hallway, I found the volume a bit annoying by closing the doors or talking in the hallway. especially early at 6:30. Maybe the doors can be insulated afterwards or

title: Thanks to Muthalip bell boy
desc: I had an over night stay in your nice and spacious hotel. It's convenient and I will return this week.I am back in room 925 this time. Special thanks to Muthalip bell service who is and great help with my many bags and positive and cheerful attitude. I will hope to see him again.

title: Review
desc: Park Avenue Changi hotel is a very good place to stay. Nice & clean! The staff there is very courteous. Ms Devi at the reception was friendly & very helpful. Ms Clarinita was a smiley person doing housekeeping, neat & clean job. Friendly staff in the Cali restaurant, too! I had a very pleasant three weeks stay!

title: Great location, worth the price
desc: Great location, awesome staff and supercomfort bed & room. Price is affordable but the services are excellent. I will highly recommend Muthalib the bellman to be promoted as he had been very helpful and honest in doing his job. Will recommend this hotel to my family and friends.

title: Great stay good service
desc: I had a great stay over at Park Avenue Changi. The accommodation was clean and comfy, i had a great sleep. I forgot to take my watch after checking out, thanks to Azhar, and Devi at the front desk, they reassured me that my samsung galaxy watch is in safe hands. And yes! I received what i thought would have already been missing.

title: Uninviting
desc: Room and bathtub not inviting at all. Musty smell. Hallways also had a lingering musty smell. Some staff had to be approached and called upon first, then will render assistance. Not welcoming.Not booking again.

title: Very spacious and clean and well equipped kitchenette
desc: I purposely chose to stay at this hotel as it is very near the airport just one stop from Changi Airport station. And also the reason I chose this hotel is because of their kitchenette. I was able to save money for dinner and breakfast as I just cooked our meals by myself.

title: Stay from 11/11 to 11/13.
desc: Say what I liked best & least. Room is clean. There is not Washlet. Wifi is slow. Breakfast is not already yet at open time. Location is good. Shpoping center is very closeed. I think allmost O.K. Thank you.

title: Good Service Convenient Location
desc: Although my check-in time was supposedly at 2pm, considering the event that we are holding with all the errands that I need to look into, the hotel front desk consultant Ms Ashley was kind enough to help me check on available rooms and granted me that early check-in to ease my stay, etc. The entire hotel team, front desk manager, housekeeper, staffs, were all very friendly and helpful. The room that I got was clean and comfortable. Location wise, this hotel is situated within 2 to 5 minutes from major Supermarkets, Shopping Malls, cafes and the MRT subway line. Overall stay was good.

title: Jitendra Yadav
desc: The housekeeping staff Specially I want to thanks to miss Han zhong ying for her dedication towards work.she is very good .she came on time and do her job very nicely . Also I would like to thanks all housekeeping staff for their hard and good work .they are really panctual and hard worker .

title: Good service
desc: The staff are really helpful and friendly. Muthalip the Bellman has been very helpful since day 1 in bringing out luggages and items to the hotel room and when we check out. The staff, Azhar has been helpful and nice in the room extension services. Had a great stay.

title: Great Stay and Strategic Location
desc: I stayed in this hotel from November 04th - November 06th as part of my business travel to Singapore. The hotel was nice and clean as well as the staff were helpful and kind. I've got the room on the fifth floor and it was nice offers with the views directly to the city and I can see the MRT Train passing down from the window. The room is spacious and they offer a lot of facilities inside the room, including the iron and iron board that I need for the business meeting. The bathroom was spacious too, as well they had the tap water that we can drink directly from the tap. Precious amenities that was incredible. On my last day when I need to do the checkout, I've remembered this one guy in black suit helped me to do my checkout administration while I noticed the others agents

title: Complement for great service provided
desc: I had my wedding at park avenue convention center. It was a great experience with hotel staff who are always there to assist. The wedding event went on smoothly. Special thanks to Jasmine, Fred, Sufian and Zura for the assistance rendered for the wedding event. Our stay in the hotel room was also great. When we call for room service, they are always prompt to assist. Front desk staff were also very friendly and helpful. Greatest thanks to Mutalip (Bellman), Azhar, Siti, Zura and Ashley. Great job Park Avenue Changi! (:

title: Good for transit hotel
desc: I was on transit and landed in changi almost midnite around 23.00 , luckily I still can catch bus to go to hotel. Check in is fast , room is quite spacious and bed is comfortable. Design is old ( especially the bathroom ) but it’s clean enough. It’s walking distance to mrt , and there is changi city point in front of hotel ( which surprisingly have factory outlet with good bargain ) I got good rest here and conventionally back to airport to catch my connecting flight.

title: Incredibly Convenient and Cosy
desc: Stayed for 2 nights. Hotel was within 2 minutes walk from the nearest train station and 5 minutes from the huge Changi City Point Mall. Yet it is incredibly quiet and quaint. Cosy and clean. Would return again.

title: Good customer service
