desc: Friendly and great service provided from:- Bellman - Muthalip Front desk - Azhar, Ashley and Siti Going to the extra mile to assist our family event and ensuring the event goes smooth and successful. Kudos

title: Nice start to a 2 day business stay
desc: First time I have stayed closer to the airport in Singapore. I have been coming to Singapore for work for the last 20 years but usually end up closer to the city center. For the room price I was expecting less. A colleague of mine from KL suggested we stay here. The rooms are clean and well appointed for working in the room. Check-in with Eleen Tan was flawless and she kindly suggested dinner options and walked me through the first timer at this property basics. I'll definitely stay here again.

title: Review for Park Avenue Changi Hotel, Singapore
desc: I have a nice experience with this hotel. It is a beautiful home in a very busy Changi Business District. Ambiance was great and very accommodating staffs, especially Mathulip. He was friendly and approchable. Mathulip did his job well!

title: Family Wedding
desc: Thanks to Muthalip (Bellman), and guest relations officers Azhar, Ashley and Siti for their outstanding service and hospitality in our 2 nights here. Highly recommended! The hotel is also close to a retail mail with many outlet stores!

title: Glad to stay in this hotel :)
desc: Everyone were so kind and helpful to me. They were so accomodating to the things that i were requesting from them. Mr. Kumar and the rest of the people there were so smiling. :) thanks guys! Looking forward to stay in this hotel again.

title: Helpful and friendly staff
desc: I have stayed i Park Avenue Changi for a few times now on business trips and every time I have been greeted with a friendly smile and helpful staff. I had wonderful experience there, Mr Azhar from the front desk made sure I had the best room and Mr Muthalip made sure I was greeted with a smile everyday. In one occasion, I was ill and Mr Kumar helped me at the clinic. I can sincerely say that a hotel is only as good as its staff. Carry on the good work gentlemen

title: A real good business hotel
desc: Even before I write about how was the experience, it’s important for me mention two names who made the first impact on me while checking in - one Mr. Kumar and Ms. Ashley. Typically the check in time works out to be 2 PM , but my arrival was earlier than that. So the check in staff were more than empathetic and gave us a little consideration. As soon as some one checked out my check in was prioritised. Quite comfortable stay of three nights with a delightful break fast spread. Their evening bar is a great experience, and this crew were quite nice to deal with. One Mr. Charles took good care indeed. Convention Center, shopping mall, MRT were all within walking distance. The airport is a 15 minutes drive. Best thing about this property is the staff are generally very nice.

title: Excellent i love this hotel
desc: as i am visited from Turkey just 1 day but its given me so good emotions want go to holiday in this hotel again really, Room is clean, and Staff are really polite and one of them Muthalip so nice and kind person courtesy.I really appreciated them. In addition location is within 30 min by train with reasonable fare. I will stay it again, definitely. Even distance from downtown, there are big mall and shopping area.It was really convenient .

title: WonderFul Experience
desc: Amazing experience for being staying in hotel as my office was nearby and all the features and amenities are simply superb. I visited his hotel 2 yrs ago and i this time also didnt faced any issues. Service and quality are same like last time. Thanks to hotel staff for making my stay comfortable.

title: Will stay again next time
desc: Close to airport and train station, nice room and equipments, good breakfast. Too few power outlets for battery recharging, water pot, clothes ironing, etc. Nice hotel staff. Tv in bedroom is a little bit small. Music center is too old to play with.

title: Good stay and location
desc: Room is clean, and Staff are really pollite and courtesy.I really appreciated them. In addition location is within 30 min by train with reasonable fare. I will stay it again, definitely. Even distance from downtown, there are big mall and shopping area.It was really convenient .

title: Good location for Changi Airport
desc: Great location to the airport as the MRT is just one stop down. Large outlet mall, 5 mins away, with plenty of shops & food places. The hotel itself is clean & functional for a stop over. Our room was smaller than I have experienced in Singapore but was very comfortable, clean & tidy. It would have been nice to have some slippers & a luggage bag trestle. We didn't have any food at the hotel as off early for another flight.

title: Quite delicious menus when breakfast
desc: Indoor shower facility is more better at swimming pool. Hotel breakfast buffet food is quite impressive. Air conditioning is so cool and room service is good, Hotel staffs are very kind and favorable as well.

title: Simple, comfortable and convenient
desc: A simple, comfortable and convenient hotel, particularly for those working in Changi Business Park area. I stay for four nights and found the rooms to be comfortable and got a good nights sleep. I didn’t get the opportunity to see pool and gym area. Room service was fast, of good quality with a reasonable range, but I found Breakfast to be limited and also quite busy with a more tourist crowd, but that’s to be expected in a hotel close to the airport. This did not impact my stay. The staff everywhere were quite efficient but I wouldn’t suggest had much of a human touch, a little formulaic, but outcome focused so limited criticism. Would stay again, if working in area. Solid but unspectacular.

title: Stay at Park Avenue
desc: Very comfortable hotel and friendly staff. Rooms are not large but are clean and tidy. Pool area a nice relief. The reception area small but functional, happy hour is offered from an outdoors bar which is a pleasant way to wind down in the evening.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Check-in was a breeze. Staff (Azhar, Iven) was very accommodating and friendly. Room was clean and everything was in order. It was a perfect family staycation! Would definitely consider staying at this hotel again.

title: Ob trip
desc: Overall stay are good..housekeeping are friendly and accomodating. The luggage assistant at the lobby are nice always with their smile. Frontdesk are helpful,aside from esreen when i check out i find her unpolite,no sense of good costumer service. She seems irritated with evey person she is dealing with,not just to me even the other guest next to me. Shes is not good to be place in frontdesk. If she is tired already and her job is dealing with people, she must know how to be good and talk to the guest with atleast a nice smile. I worked in costumer service also before,i know that i should not show such kind of emotion.so unpleasant to talk with her. Thank you and im sorry for the bad feedback for her.

title: 2 day stop over
desc: This hotel was great find. Mid $$$ close to airport & CBD. Very clean and offering all amenities. Right in business park, University and a huge retail mall full off every retail outlet you can think off and the best food

title: Official Trip. Next to my Office
desc: My first time stay at Park Avenue Changi Suite, Singapore, for Business Trip. Personalized service by Muthalip Bellman. Friendly staff and good service. Overall good place to stay and good experience.

title: Great Stay
desc: I have had great experience staying at this hotel. The facilities and services provided are just exceptional. I have had the pleasure to get to know some of the hotel staff (as listed below) who are very very friendly and helpful. Hats off to them. They definitely make my stay pleasant and unforgettable. I sure hope I can come back :) 1. Muthalip 2. Shafie 3. Azhar 4. Elaine 5. Kumar 6. Claranita

title: Muthalip bellman.
desc: Very friendly service by Muthalip. Kind. Very near to hotel. Near to my office. Near to airport. Friendly staff. One more staff name Kumar, he is very kind. Good attitude by Kumar. We came 2 hours before the check in time and he managed to get us a room quickly.

title: Review
desc: It's a great place to stay. Very near to my office. Good deal n very nice service apartment with washing machine. Breakfast menu was totally good. For indians it was totally good one to try who don't like spices although. Muthalip and Kumar are special one to note for their service. Totally great hospitality!

title: A nice hotel to stay
desc: This is my second time staying at Park Avenue Hotels and Suites for business purpose. I was surprised when I check in the Hotel upgrade my room for free due to their Superior room is full. As always the hotel is nice, amenities complete, clean, a nice place to relax after working hours

title: MS
desc: I love the service very very much. Very kind, polite. Always positive staff delicious breakfast, hotel room service top, I was always happy when I get in my room. It was very nice for me that the hotel has Gym room and swimming pool Loved it! I'll come back again if I would come to Singapore ! 😍❤❤❤

title: Very comfortable stay near the airport
desc: Very comfortable hotel near Singapore airport. Will come again. Very close to MRT, Good eating joints nearby and shopping too. Ideal for a short business trip to Singapore. I really enjoyed my stay and the staff were efficient and courteous.

title: Miss
desc: I stayed for 3 nights,after a long flight, I was tired and longing for a place to sleep..the reception staff was very sympathetic and I was helped quite soon...when I checked out the gentlemen on duty, Muthalip Beliman and Azar helped me..they helped me to get my phone battery charged so that I can communicate with my near and dear and they helped me with a taxi..I thought it very thoughtful of them to give me a bottle of water. These gents really helped me by making sure my stay end on pleasant note.

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Check in was fast and very comfortable due to the room is convenient. Room small but complete and with coffee and tea Check out was very good and they showed me to atm and supermarket to buy before my flight. Wonderful hotel and will come back again

title: So nice
desc: My visit at the hotel was all in all very good, nice and clean rooms. Friendly staff and good services. Especially the concierge Kumar was very kind and offered always a good service. The hotel is located near a shopping center and super market which was really practical.

title: A nice place to be
desc: It's a beautiful and cosy place to stay if you can afford it. The location is fine; surrounded by the mall and the train station. The rooms are spacious. didn't stay long to rate their services. I stayed for few hours. If the booking was done by a third party, remember to have some cash/card with you. The hotel requested for a night's rate as security deposit. I believe they should include this information in their website and not to take people by surprise when checking in. In all, it was a nice place.

title: Pleasant and good
desc: Pour flight was delayed and happened to stay here for 1 night and its good stay Staff was friendly and check in was fast Room was a bit squessy but clean and smells good Restaurant around was a lot but mostly are indians Will be back again and with friends.

title: 3 Months Stay
desc: I stay for 3 months.. Very comfort place, near to changi airport, a bit far from downtown, but can easily reach with MRT next to the Hotel. I brought family for some days, you can cook here as the hotel provide the kitchen with all the cooking tools, and washing machine. Good if you want to minimize the luggage :)

title: Disappointed Stay
desc: Front Desk Personnel Image: At check in, I was greeted with front desk personnel with super strong cigarette smell. Doesn't reflect well on the hotel's image. Room Facilities: The 2 bedroom suite fridge comes with a foul smell. It seems like something had turned bad previously and the smell was not cleared for the next guest. Unacceptable and hygiene is a concern. Wrong information provided by front desk: I checked in on 4/10/12 for 2 nights stay. On 5/10/12 around 11ish am, I checked with the front desk on the information of complimentary parking at the hotel. The indian lady who was on duty told me that the carpark is charged at per exit of $3.20. I clarified that it is regardless of the duration parked that the parking charges is charged on a per exit basis. i.e. as

title: Convenient aftee a long flight
desc: Check in was fast and lovely.staff was very helpful and professional. Room was small but clean and complete Pool and gym is very quite and workable Check out was help by lady staff name elaine and really helpful. Thank you and will be back

title: Good Sort Business Stay
desc: Adequate rooms and facilities suitable for short business stays. Location is at the center of Changi Business area, close to shopping complexes, grocery stores, and MRT. Breakfast food needs a lot of improvement. There's a low vibration sound from the ventilation system (?) that can be heard from the hotel room.

title: Great service
desc: Fantastic & friendly service. Great place to stay. Good ambience ... nice place for people on business travel with various options to connect closer. This place is maintained neat n clean & very much service oriented

title: Perfect stay
desc: Excellent performance from each personal nice room with good view Good location next to Expo shopping mall public transportation gym and pool good restaurant thanks to all of the personal who made the stay excellent

title: Great staff
desc: I lost my iPhone in the taxi from Changi Airport to Park Avenue. As soon as I noticed it, I went to from desk for help. Mufhalip kindly called the taxi company for me. Then, I went out for dinner. Within one hour, my iPhone is back! Thank you, Mufhalip!

title: Staff are friendly
desc: Professional support by staff with smiles. One of them Kumar is the best supporter during my stay. Rooms are fine with enough space and cleanness. Quick connection to the earnest MRT Expo and shopping malls.

title: World class service
desc: I had to make some last minute changes to my booking and I must say the service was excellent. Ms. Eleen Tan from front office was super helpful and polite. Thank you for this world class service. Thanks, Anisha

title: Not much to enjoy
desc: Room is normal and convenient Check in staff is friendly that’s the plus points.they are willing to help and go extra mile to send your required items Room is normal and restaurant also normal Overall is very good and what matters is the staff professionalism. Thanks a lot and will be back.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: I was there twice. Great facility and very professional staff. Eileen at the reception is always willing to help you with a beautiful smile. Hotel location is great, close to public transportation, about 20-25 minutes from downtown.

title: Staycay
desc: Very comfy setting with service apartment facilities including washing machine, induction cooker and bath tub. Clean place. Nt very near city centre but near air port. Walking distance to shopping mall and singapore expo

title: Competent and convenient
desc: Hotel is very close to airport and met Check in early morning and got the room early.thankful for that. Room is clean and pool is very small. Gym is small and clean also. A lot of restaurant around the area.

title: Nice staff : Kumar
desc: Kumar was helped me carry 6 big luggages since we dropped of the car. Greet us every time we met each other. He always do extra which is goooodddd. And the other staff are nice too. Room is clean and neat. Shampoo and soap is eco-friendly👍🏻👍🏻

title: Excellent stay
desc: Good location as it is near to the mrt station. Has nice room amenities & staff are polite. Can easily find food nearby (shopping mall, restaurants etc). There is a Fairprice Extra nearby which is very useful as the room is equipped with a kitchen.

title: great service staff -mr.kumar
desc: hotel room is nice and neat. and also with Staff at this hotel is very nice and kind esp. the bell boy “mr. Kumar”. Along the 7 days that we stayed here we really had a great time. We truly appreciated his assistance.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Hotel is small and not much fun. Room was clean and the bsest is the staff service from reception. They are very kind to bring back my lost items. Send me price and compare before they ask for my credit card Very good service and amazing staff. This is to recommend the staff on their excellent help. Thank you

title: Great value next to Convention Center and Expo center
desc: I stayed at the Park Ave Changi for 6 nights while attending a conference across the way at the Expo. The hotel is clean and modern. Downstairs restaurant served a plentiful breakfast buffet with make-your-own egg dish, Asian and Western food. The room was quiet, clean, with a comfy bed and modern bathroom. The air conditioning worked well and was quiet. The key was required to go up in the elevator and turn on the power in the room. Short walk to the train station. Great value for a business stay!

title: Hotel near Airport
desc: Hotel was very near to airport lots of restaurant and supermarket is to walk only Check in staff is very friendly and give only 1 key to room Room have issue and responds very fast and solved Restaurant not nice cos staff is busy and not attentive Changing city point have lots of restaurant to Happy to be here in Singapore with nice hotel

title: Perfect in Everyway
desc: We arrived at 1:30 AM after nearly 24 hours in the air. The front desk staff was fast, pleasant and efficient and we were in our room very quickly. The room was wonderful, quiet, clean and everything worked perfectly.

title: Hotel is Amazing
desc: Check is very fast and staff help on tour and luggage. Morning breakfast not that much and a bit warm Room is really clean and with fast WiFi. Housekeeping is really helpful and help us give towel Check out is fast and staff was very efficient and friendly We choose this hotel again

title: LACK OF EMPATHY
desc: This hotel is very good and the staff very efficient. However, I am not happy about the following. I originally booked the hotel through a third party site (on TripAdvisor) for 188.77 AUD (inclusive of taxes etc.). Sometime after my booking the booking site went into liquidation cancelled all hotel bookings. I was not aware of this until I went to book into the hotel and was told the booking had been cancelled. As I was already at the hotel, I booked in. I misunderstood what rate I was being charged and was absolutely amazed when the charge turned out to be $386 AUD. I emailed the hotel asking for some sympathy for my experience and sought some sort of refund for a reduced rate. No way, they said they were almost full that night and the full rate would remain. A lovely way to

title: Good and clean hotel
desc: Good location as near to airport. Many eateries around the vicinity. Very convenient to get to the city. Room are comfortable but I requested for a double room one month before my arrival and still they couldn’t help. The twin bed is a little small .

title: Good hotel, great location for airport transit.
desc: For people who have an overnight stop in Singapore and want to stay near the airport, the Park Avenue Changi is the best value for money. I've stayed her twice and will definitely book again if I overnight in Singapore. It's a lot less expensive than the on-airport hotels, and conveniently located across the street from Expo MRT station. (Changi Airport is 1 stop away on the MRT.) The staff is efficient, and the rooms are modern, clean and quiet--nothing special, but good for a night's stay. There is an attached bar and restaurant for those thirsty or peckish.

title: Very bad experience
desc: Bug infested beds and sofa, heavily bitten by bugs in legs and arms. Dirty carpets, kept sneezing every now and then. Unfriendly customer service, only care about money. No compassion although i mentioned that my dad is sick. Charging full rate for late checkout 25 mins late. Will never go back.

title: Extremely Satisfied Stay at Park Ave Hotel
desc: The staff was extremely accommodating and friendly. The breakfast that was included in our hotel fee was delicious. The rooms were modern and clean. The location was great--nearby a metro station and near a shopping mall.

title: Clean and functional
desc: Clean rooms. Nothing exceptional. Located close to airport and subway, but 1h commute to downtown. Excellent breakfast. Good air conditioning and very silent. Very friendly staff, especially bellman Muthalip.

title: Good Experience
desc: stayed 02 nights. every thing was amazing experience this one my first time to visit Singapore coming soon and will choose again same hotel. cleaning room was best and staff was really amazing and fully trannied. hope hotel have own restaurant as well because restaurant staff was quite not so excited to see in house guest.

title: Excellent customer assistance
desc: Bellman Muthalip and front desk guy Azhar helped me when I lost my phone during my stay. I'm commending these two gentlemen for the help they gave me, specially Muthalip. Keep it up. Nice experience staying here, excellent staff and very friendly.

title: Will be back
desc: Hotel was very near to airport. Train 1 station and taxi like 15 minutes. Taxi is available by staff call. They are very helpful. Room and check is is okay. Clean room with all amenities. Restaurant is outdoor and no aircon. A bit warm. Food not that varieties. Will try again once we are in Singapore.

title: Must try
desc: hotel very close to airport. Staff was amazing and help us on tour package Room small but clean and housekeeping also Chinese speaking can't speak English Bathtud is amazing and relaxing Check out was easy and fast Will be back again and thank you.

title: I expected a little more...
desc: We stayed for three nights in September and were left with the impression that it had been a good hotel, but had slipped a bit. The shower in our room had a glass wall with an internal ledge which caught the shower water and caused the water to drain around the rim of the bathtub and then finally to a develop huge puddle on the floor. The fundamental cause was incorrect slope on the bath which forced the water to try to run uphill. The hotel had tried to fix it with silicone sealer, but it needed the bath to be reinstalled at the correct slope. With years of pooled water, the grout had gone mouldy and the leaks had rusted the steel doorframe.. Clearly we were not the first occupants to suffer this problem. I’ve added some photos showing the mould in our room, 628. The best

title: Just good enough
desc: Room is small and clean. Check in was fast and easy. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Swimming pool is small and also gym. Not much equipment at the gym. Check out was OK but a bit crowded Will stay again. Thank you

title: Great Stay
desc: Flight delayed and first time in this hotel. Room was great and staff was helpful and friendly. Clean location and lots of restaurant around the areas. Pool so small and also the gym. Check out was fast and taxi is free from hotel.

title: accessible
desc: shops and business centers are within walking distance. plenty of choices to choose from for food, even personal items. it was also very close to a well stocked convenience supermarket wherein food is fresh and affordable.

title: Helpful Staff
desc: Hotel was very clean and maintained, Rooms were comfortable and clean and quiet. Staff wee all very helpful and nothing was too much trouble. Mujhalip Bellmar was able to get taxis, show the way, organised trips and knows just about all the good places to go, nothing was an issue.

title: Great service
desc: Very nice service by Mr. Muthalip.. Very helping.. In cali.. Ms. Nancy was very soft spoken n friendly.. I enjoyed the food at cali.. Next time I will come with family.. I will advise friends to visit this hotel..

title: Like home stay
desc: Very convenient and staff was lovely. Room is clean and compact TV is a lot of channels Restaurant is Indian and outdoor. I don't like there burger. Check out was amazing and quick. Train very near and one stop to airport

title: Recent stay at Changi Park Hotel
desc: This hotel is sited near the Expo - pretty isolated but worked OK as I was attending a conference there. Easy to access from Changi Airport on the train. Check-in OK. Room very disappointing as there was mould in all the seals around the combined bath/shower that made it look terrible - this really needs correcting. Internet did not work in the exterior bar/restaurant area. You would on,y go there for a conference at EXPO - unattractive and I remain traumatised by the state of the bathroom.

title: Excellent location, friendly staff
desc: This hotel is in an excellent location for anyone needing to be near Changi Airport. It's only one MRT stop from the airport and the MRT is only one block away from the hotel. There are good shopping and dining options within nearby walking distance, including some decent restaurants and McDonald's and Burger King for those who just need American fast food. The staff was (or is it were) friendly and helpful. Answering all of my questions quickly. Check in and check out was very easy. The room was just right size, not to small, not too large, and very clean. The bed was very comfortable. I slept very well the night prior to my long journey back to the US. I would recommend this hotel to anyone flying into Singapore.

title: Hotel stay
desc: hotel very near to airport. And train station too. Check in was fast and very helpful especially with kids. Room small a ng staff only speak chines. Check out fast and taxi available 24hrs We will come back and stay again

title: Room facilities and access to essentials
desc: The executive suite was very convenient with all facilities. The hotel is close to train station and the multi-cuisine restaurants at changi business park. Highly recommended for those looking for official stay at changi business park. Bell boys are very courteous and friendly. Bellman Muthalip provided exceptional service.

title: Convenient to expo
desc: Hotel was very near to expo exhibition. I attended the expo and just walk and very near. Room was clean and compact. Hskpg who clean can't talk english Frontboffice was very active and saw them very busy. Restaurant is an Indian and food so expensive. Total experience is happy and satisfied. Service staff was amazing during check out and help us with luggage. Thank you front staff.

title: Better than average
desc: I usually stay at Capri, which is within the same area, but decided to try Park Avenue for comparison. The location is great and conveniently located about 10-15 minutes to the Changi Airport by cab. The hotel is next to a mall, the convention center and a subway station. Rooms are smaller, with standard design and layout. A good value because of the lower price.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Hotel was near to airport. Arrived with flight delayed and room was small. Check in was fast and staff was very helpful. Restaurant was close or just lights off. Check out by taxi worth 15dollars and help us for luggage. Hope to try with family in the future.

title: Excellent
desc: Choose this hotel cos near to expo for our exhibits We booked 2 rooms and 1 extra bed. Extra bed was charge no free. Room was clean but small. Check in was fast and staff is friendly Gym is small and not so complete Check out a bit crowded and manager was really helpful and go out to help us

title: Nice
desc: The room is big enough, nice, clean, and comfy, next to changi city point mall, and in front of MRT station. Just one step to Changi MRT station. Fast Check in and check out. The price also reasonable.

title: Nice Stay
desc: Check in a bit early and was given a room. Really appreciate the help. Staff was friendly and helpful. Next day went for breakfast and not much options. Open air concept. Room and pool is small but clean. Food in the area are mostly not halal. Check out was fast and will be back again.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: We were up graded to a suite. There was a small Kitchen and a washing machine. The house cleaning supervisor taught us how to use the washing machine and we requested for a clothes drying rack. Was so happy they provided us with the clothes drying rack. We were in a rush to leave in the morning and when we came back all the dishes was washed. All the staff were very pleasant. Will definitely stay in this hotel again.

title: Good stay for short or long term
desc: The hotel is standing in very convenient place. There are MRT station, supermarket, shopping mall and more...You can reach them within 5 mins walk. Hotel also has laundry machine beside swimming pool and dryer as well.

title: Great alternative to Airport Hotel
desc: We recently stayed 1 night between flights and found it to be very good and much cheaper than the Airport Hotel. Taxi was under S$10 and around 10 minutes. The food choices in the nearby shopping centre were very good. The room itself was clean and comfortable and the water filter in the bathroom was great.

title: The nearest hotel to SUTD
desc: I think it is average good. But the equipments should be maintained in time, like air-conditioner. It’s too noisy to sleep. Basic toiletries are not complete. There is no shaver and shaving form/gel for male. They are the important toiletries, aren’t they?

title: Best option
desc: Best option for this hotel. Check in was fast and easy Restaurant was crowded and busy Room was very clean and tidy. Check out was fast but Fred and help us to booked taxi. He is really helpful and friendly. Thank you for a wonderful stay

title: Love this Hotel
desc: Hotel is very convenient and near to airport Check in early and was given a room outright. Room is spacious and clean Lots of restaurant around the area Check out was fast and lively. Front office was great. Thank you so much

title: Near airport
desc: Check in was fast and taxi a bit expensive. Room was okay and small but clean Pool small but clean. Staff was amazing and very friendly. Check out was fast and with a smile Thank you so much for a wonderful stay. Will be back

title: Good stay
desc: Good and convenient Check in was fast and reception manager very helpful Room a bit small but clean Check out was fast and helpful staff Thank you and be back again Highly recommend hotel with friendly staff

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Had a great time to stay coz it has a nice room and facilities. The staff are nice and easy to approach. Had a convinient, wonderful, relaxing bed and accomomodations. Till next time. Have a wonderful day and best regards. Thank you so much.

title: Facilities a bit not so modern but service quality is really great
desc: I arrived at the hotel from a delayed flight with rush and tight schedule ahead. The counter staff were overwhelmed with ppl at that time so Mr Muthalip who works as a bellman proactively helped me to check-in. He later came all the way to my room to tell me about the bus arrangement for me the next day, an action I found surprised cause he could have just called me by the room phone. The hotel room was spacious (mine was upgraded to a suite) and I have more than enough space to work later that night. Pity that I couldn't try the pool but my overall experience was nice. Thank you!

title: If you have a choice, go somewhere else
desc: Location was OK, next to a mall and a supermarket, which is why it is 2 not 1 star. Charges were 5 star level but service is sub-par. We were traveling with an infant and they patched a call through to our room in the early morning without verifying who the caller was calling (wrong room of course) and woke up our baby. They had a water filter in the room, which would have been good, if it was actually installed correctly. The faucet spun around completely loose. Their "pool" was maybe at most 3 feet wide; would be really interesting to see anyone try to swim in it. The lift had a mind of its own, stopping (or not stopping) and random floors, we thought we were going to get trapped in it for a minute. Luckily the doors finally opened without incident. Wanted to book airport

title: As expected, clean, convenient
desc: I stayed one night arriving at 1am and leaving at 7am. The receptionist was helpful with paying for my taxi with cash that I didn't have, and then charging it to my room. The room was totally fine. Taxi to and from the airport was easy, but I noted that the hotel website was silent on transfers. It wasn't a problem anyway.

title: Happy and contented
desc: Im happy coz i choose the right place to stay and feel relax at the same time. Great location and the room was well equipped and organize. Staffs are accommodating and approachable and the services are nice and fast. Foods are good and delicious. Hoping to comeback soon. Great hotel and more power.

title: Honeymoon setup not provided
desc: Overall stay was average because the requested setup aside from King bed was not there. Standard room supplies were there, but no honeymoon setup.. would have expected that when we arrived. Other than that, room service was daily provided. Room was clean and does not smell.

title: Highly recommended!
desc: The 2 bedroom suite was amazing! Clean and neat.. Reasonable price with well equipped facilities.. The hotel is near to mrt and shopping mall. Friendly staffs and very helpful.. I will definitely come here again..

title: Feeling Great
desc: Didnt expect this coz i had a great time and have fun especially the food and the staff are so friendly. The room are so clean and the bed was so smooth,And i had a good sleep. More power and continue the good services. Thank you much. Appreciate it

title: Kindness
desc: The room was clean. And it was very comfortable. And Ashley, thank you for your kindness and service. And it was good because it was close to the Expo. And I was close to a place where I could buy groceries, and I could easily catch a subway or a taxi.

title: excellent
desc: good service by the staff check us in iven and azhar. room was clean n nice,pool view is superb. breakfast was ok..need more variety of food.many bird was around.aniway my family will come back again.

title: Comfortable to stay
desc: Very fast and have a good quality service.room is clean and the staff are friendly.bed is comfortable and organize. Im amaze coz i feel like im home. Hope to stay here again. Thank you and keep it up.

title: G12 Stay 2019
desc: We chose to stay in this hotel mainly of its location and price. The room we stayed in has shown signs of worn down. The tiles around the brink of the bathtub could be more clean. Overall stay was ok.

title: Comfortable
desc: Hotel is comfortable and clean. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Breakfast not that much and warm environment. Room toilet have bathtub and need to be repair. Swimming pool was really small it seems okay. Check out was fast and no hassles. Taxi is very accessible. Thank you for your good service at reception! I will be back.

title: Staycation in the East
desc: Clean rooms. Spacious toilets and rooms. Well equipped kitchenette. Dining area for 4 (however dining chairs were abit torn and old). TV connectivity was disruptive initially but all worked out well after some time. Hair dryer provided was working good! Beds were super comfy 👏🏼 Friendly hotel staff (Devi especially! 👍🏼) Close proximity to MRT and Changi City shopping mall

title: Best Hotel To Stay
desc: It nice hotel & suites, it my first time staying at this hotel, recommended by my colleague. The check in fast, the staff was friendly & helpful especially by Mr Shafie,he show me around the hotel area,near by super market & shopping malls. I sincerely thank to Mr Shafie for booking for me the Universal Studio, Sea Aquarium & Garden By The Bay. We will come back to this hotel,friendly & helpful staff

title: Staff were very helpful
desc: Staff were very helpful and cheerful. They responded quickly to requests. Hotel was clean and toiletries were refilled every day. Location was great, it was close to shops and MRT. All the amenities we needed were provided in the kitchen. The only negative thing is that the key card gets deactivated every now then. So, we had them reactivated a couple of times during our stay.

title: Happy customer
desc: I was there for a business trip and my stay at the hotel was nice. Very happy with the hotel staff as they were all very courteous and friendly and at times have gone out of the way to assist to ensure a comfortable stay.

title: Best Hotel to stay near expo
desc: The facility is good and accessible to us Our family satisfied the service as well I am recommend it to my friends if they plan to visit Singapore The staff are very friendly at all times Thank you very much

title: Great place to stay!
desc: Staff were very accommodating and helpful to our requests. Great location, near the mall and MRT station. They also have a mobile phone with internet that you can use during your stay. We also had a free room upgrade which was a bonus!

title: Great!
desc: It’s my first time here in SG! it was a great stay here, specially when you’ll go near at the expo. I attended a conference there. Only 5 mins away from our hotel. There accommodations are good and their people our so friendly. I love it here!

title: Warm and Welcoming
desc: We stayed for 10 days and were welcomed from the beginning. All the staff were very friendly and Muthalip was most helpful. The facilities were very clean and well maintained. Whike it is far from the city centre, you have everything you need around you.

title: The Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: My husband and I had a great stay in this hotel the room is very clean and spacious I will stay again in this hotel highly recommended to all very near in the airport accessible to atm, convenience store and mall.

title: Good Customer Service
desc: Hotel are near to mrt station and mall, it's very convenient. The staff are all friendly when i reached. I was served by Mr Azhar, he was friendly and generous while serving me. I had trouble with the room card while taking the lift which i could not access it twice. The first time i came to him and told him about it. The second time he came to the lift himself and ask if the card can access. He told me to stay at the lobby area while he go and change the room card. Once he changed the card, he came over and try it himself to ensure the new card is accessible. This shows that they care for their guest. Good customer service obviously. 👍🏼👍🏼 Room was very nice and the high floor view was great. I did had a comfortable stay and a great time here.

title: My compliance of this Hotel
desc: Muthalip The bellman after us very well.also convinced to changi airport,MRT and cheap eating places liked convenience which over rode distance from city room had washing and small kitchen. Very good service...

title: Close to airport
desc: The Park Avenue was close to Changi airport and the Expo MRT stop. It was perfect for what we needed on the night before we left Singapore. The service was nice enough and the rooms clean. Overall, a good experience

title: Convenient and Comfortable
desc: A little far from the city area but fear not as the hotel is located next to mrt and shopping mall. Room is clean and comfortable. Staff is also friendly. The room we booked was a deluxe room but we were upgraded to an executive deluxe upon check in. Room amenities are also provided and you can do your own laundry too.

title: Nice stay
desc: Good stay and staff very helpful. Room very nice and clean. Staff was very professional and amazing. Muthalip and Fred was very accomodating and friendly . Good stay and will be back. Will be back and stay again...very amazing stay

title: Comfortable room, no complaints
desc: This hotel was recommended to me because it's close to my host company's office and good quality. Everything was pretty much perfect, not much else to say. Breakfast is available at a restaurant just across the courtyard, a 30 second walk. I like a room where the A/C fan stays on and provides good white noise. This one fit the bill!

title: Compliment
desc: Muthalip Bellman is very good and professional. He helped me a lot for my 6bags.all the stuff here are friendly with the big smile, And hotel is very clean, I will visit again!Thank you very much Park Avenue!

title: Excellent service!
desc: Warmly welcomed by friendly check in counter staff. They are professional and well groomed. Hotel is near to shopping mall and MRT. Easily accessible is a plus point. Hotel is nice and fully equipped. Quality of bed is good and I had rested well! Would definitely come back again!

title: Will stay again
desc: We had to find an emergency hotel when our flight was cancelled . Myself and two kids 11 and 7 got a room . We did have to share a queen bed. Not ideal . But, we managed . One at the bottom and two at the top. Ha ha . The staff were so accommodating. Muthalis the bellman showed us to our room and brought our cases. He explained everything in the room . There are free calls to UK, USA. Australia and a few others on the phone in the room. Which is so handy. Free WiFi on 4 devises. Again brilliant . Devi on check-in was very accommodating and did all she could for us The hotel is perfect for jet lagged families. A 2 min walk to the mall to grab food and supplies. And if you had the time and energy a 1 min walk to the metro. A pool too if you had the time. We didn't . We slept

title: good hotel near airport
desc: booked for 3 nights and lucky i choosed this hotel. check in was very good and staff was very helpful..they help us for luggage and show us the lift. room was clean and comfortable..toilet need improvement and just good enough for 1 person to use. hotel have a lot of restaurant around the areas. check out same fast and friendly..they really go out on the way to help and booked u a taxi. card was given to rate them in trip advisor...so here i am now guys writing what you have done to me. thank you and all you guys are amazing!well be back😀😀..

title: Excellent Service
desc: The hotel stay was really amazing.It's situated closer to MRT and has other grocery shops nearby. Since it's closer to airport we didn't we didn't face any issue with the commutation. The hotel has an excellent room service. If you get to stay over here please contact Muthalip(bellman) for any queries or suggestions. He has been really helpful in maneuvering us around the city and made our stay comfortable.

title: Bed is small. Need super single bed
desc: For twin room pls equip at least super single bed. The rest of the room is well maintained and the location is good. Air con is noisy at night and the sleep quality is average. Recommended for family if the bed is super single

title: Friendly staffs provide good services
desc: We stayed at the hotel as our friend was having their wedding at the convention centre. The beautiful receiptionist Ms Devi was very friendly and polite. She was always smiling and greet us whenever she saw us. Eventhough the hotel was running full house she was able to provide early check in at 10am for one of the room for us to get ready. The rest of the staffs was also very helpful like carried ton of stuffs for the wedding couple to their room several times. Hotel rooms are squeaky clean and smell great. Bed and pillows are super comfy. Our family and friends really enjoy our stay there. The manager on duty was superb as well. Thank you. From room 726 & 729

title: Great when I found it
desc: Excellent hotel only one MRT stops from the airport, the only problem being to find it, as it's almost impossible to see from the Expo station exit. Great service from Kumar for our luggage storage request.

title: Good and Deserving
desc: Booked for 2 nights and really enjoy. Check in was fast and friendly. Staff was very helpful and willing to extend to carry my luggage. Room was clean and comfy. Toilet was clean Gym small but clean and complete. Checked out was fast and taxi was help by bellman. The staff in this hotel was amazing from FO to security. Thank you and will stay again.

title: Nice comfortable hotel with friendly personell
desc: Good location - close to airport and very close to MRT. Big shopping center nearby. Nice, clean, with personell ready to help. Special thanks to Devaki who helped a lot after I've checked out. Room is not big, but very comfortable with all neeed.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: I stayed here for one night and was upgraded to a suite. A pleasant surprise. The room facilities was akin to a studio apartment with a small but well equipped kitchenette (stove, toaster, microwave). There was even a washing machine with dryer in the room. The bed was comfortable and there were plenty of channels on TV to choose from. Most importantly, it is a stone’s throw from the train station, a mall and a supermarket. Very convenient!

title: Nice ambience for short staycation
desc: Simple hotel but room ambience is nice and cosy. A lot of eatery choice nearby as Changi city point is just 2min away. Only thing is the swimming pools is a bit small. No need to buy room with breakfast.,

title: comment of great service
desc: I would like to thanks Devi ,customer front desk for her professional service and polite attitude.. she goes all out to give advice and help to us..most of all she was very patient .. well done Devi !

title: Muthalip is the best Bellman!
desc: We’re 4 girls from Thailand staying in Park Avenue Changi Hotel first time. And, ”Mr. Muthalip” is the best Bellman we’ve ever met! He has the best hospitality helping us since we are stepping out from the taxis until we get in to our rooms. He’s very nice and very friendly telling us helpful information. We appreciate your helpful Mr. Muthalip. Our first day of arriving in Singapore is great because of you:) From 4 Thai girls.

title: Looking for convenient accomodation near Changi Airport
desc: Muthalip the bellman looked after us very well. Also concenient to Changi airport, MRT and cheap eating places Liked convenience which over-rode distance from city centre Room had washing machine and small kitchen

title: Good hotel for business trip
desc: Nice hotel with good facilities, nice and quiet area. Close from the airport and from the MRT to go in the city center ( about 25 minutes ). Nice commercial center next to the hotel. Various good restaurants in the area. Very good staff, special thanks to Kumar for his kindness.

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Had a comfortable stay at Park Avenue Hotel. Had stayed here for 20 days. Located at a nice location close to my office. Staff was courteous and helpful especially Bell Man Muthalip was really helpful during our stay.

title: Best Stay and location
desc: Reserved room for 1 night. Check in was amazing and staff was good and helpful. Rokm was clean and comfortable. Gym was small and view was amazing. Upon check out, the staff was fast and help us in taxi and luggage. We will come back and recommend this hotel to my family. Service amazed us and thank you.

title: nice hotel for business trip
desc: the room size and facilities is good. the room are clean and comfortable. Is close to airport, MRT and surrounding have a shopping mall where you can get anything that you want. It suit for business meeting

title: Wonderful
desc: We took the 1 bedroom unit. Good sized room and amenities but toilet is abit small. Good location with a mall, spore expo, train, bus, supermarket all wothin walking distance. Great staff like Eleen who remembered our preference.

title: Overnight stopover in Singapore
desc: close to the airport and other amenities, like supermarket and food places. Also very easy access to MRT. Staff very very friendly and accommodated our needs as a travelling family. We would stay here again.

title: Excellent Staff
desc: We were on a business trip and the team at Changi Park Avenue were very accommodating. Right from the get-go, their warm smiles and courteous demeanour made us feel welcome and at home. I especially want to commend Mr Muthalid for going above and beyond. He was always ready to ready to lend a hand when have some questions. Thank you Mr Muthalid and team.

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: We had a great stay at this hotel which had some unique amenities including a mobile device to make international calls for free, a washing machine and dryer etc. The staff was friendly, especially the bellman MuthaliP was very helpful and warm. I would highly recommend staying here if the management can fix one thing - the Wifi connectivity kept dropping every few minutes which was very frustrating. Otherwise, the facilities were great.

title: Reasonable price and good location
desc: Good place to stay nice and with facility surrounded the hotel Friendly staff good hotel good good good very good good hotel room is big and nice with all the necessary stuff don’t even need to bring toothbrush

title: Disappointing
desc: Terrible food and food service. Unobliging staff, working to a clock, more interested in interactions with each other than with the welfare of guests. Reception staff were proficient, rooms were excellent. The rooms have kitchens, I suggest ordering a hamper for your room when you arrive.

title: Hostile at Breakfast
desc: We stayed for 5 days at the hotel for a music competition. The stuff were very nice and accommodating. It’s very convenient with great food and shopping nearby. The hotel location is far from the major attractions, but taxis of all kinds are very accessible. The only bad taste (literally) is that they are very strict with the complimentary breakfast(which is subpar), name checking, room key swipe and head count, to the point that I felt very uncomfortable. God forbidden if you make a mistake on the room number, it is not exaggerating to say that you would be treated like a criminal.

title: Outstanding Accommodation
desc: The staffs are kind and respectful from managers to receptionists. Samantha did my check in. She is so sweet and welcoming. Easy access to the city. The suite is huge with full kitchen amenities. Did not manage to use any of it but would love to next time.

title: Good hotel in convenient area
desc: Good, clean hotel near the Changi Airport and in an area that has everything you need close by. Lots of restaurants, shopping mall, grocery store, etc. Not real close to any of the sites of Singapore but MRT station entrance is 100m from the front door. My room was modern and spacious. Comfortable bed. Shower was OK. Breakfast is fine, good coffee machine.

title: Family bday celebration
desc: We stayed at a 2 bedroom suite n its big, spacious n clean. Location is very convenient as there are many shops nearby n a shopping centre. Theres also a big supermarket nearby for all your daily needs.

title: Acceptable for night stay but..
desc: It is acceptable in all standards however probably good for 1 or 2 nights max. Room is ok size with the standard amenities, water is from a distilled tap in the bathroom/toilet. The room has nothing much to shout about however it suffices the need for a night rest. I suppose this hotel for business travellers and/or people just staying for a couple of nights, it will do just fine. The first time we took a lift to our hotel floor at level 4, the lift door could not open and we had to take another lift to our floor. Subsequent times, the lift was working fine. The pool is at best for 1 to 2 swimmers so i would not recommend going there for a swim. Some small companies reside on the top floor, supposedly commerical with the pool area so good to take note.

title: GREAT LOCATION TO AIRPORT AND EXPO MRT
desc: I stayed here for 7 days for business. The location of the hotel is close to the Airport and EXPO MRT. I also has lots of food options at the Changi City Point Shopping Centre. I only had breakfast in the hotel once and wasnt that impressed. Not a lot of healthy options. Suggest more fruit and it was so busy on some mornings you just couldnt get in there. The room I stayed in was good, Coffee and Tea making facilites, fridge. My only other suggestion would be that the hotel DONT give you a clean towel everyday, its just no necessary, most people use a towel at home 3-4 or 4-5 times before it is washed, I got a clean towel everyday which I thought was excessive. Other than that I would definately stay again....

title: I will come back again for sure
desc: Good job, hopefully the bath can be bigger, staffs can have more smile. then I will call it a 5 stars hotel good good good good Good job, hopefully the bath can be bigger, staffs can have more smile. then I will call it a 5 stars hotel

title: Awesome place to stay.
desc: This is one of the nice place, hotel and restaurant staffs were friendly, nice food, a comfortable place to stay to make your trip awesome. My total experience here was the best.Airport and city accessibility was easy because of subway access. Thank you for your service.

title: Convenient, clean and comfy
desc: Conveniently located diagonally opposite expo mrt station (about 3 mins walk) which is just 1 station away from changi airport mrt station. It's about 50 mins mrt ride to the city/cbd area, but it's well connected via the green (east) line and blue (downtown) line. Convenient in the sense that there's a fair price supermarket next to it (open from 8am till quite late), a shopping mall in front of it, a mcd in the shopping mall (open from early morning till 2am), Burger King downstairs and a 24 hours hotel service. Room is spacious and clean Bathroom is spacious and clean, comes with a bathtub and a huge see through window facing the bed, but don't worry there's a pull down screen. The bathtub stopper wasn't working, so I have to manually pull it out to drain the water. On

title: Great stay
desc: Nice and clean. Prompt replies from service staff. Staff were prompt in taking in request and was able to switch a room as the aircon was not able to reach into the bedroom. Overall the cleanliness of the rooms are good ans very responsive staff.

title: Kumar might be the best porter there is!
desc: A great, easy stay in a well-located hotel! Tidy, with a nice fit-out. Handily located next to a great mall with all you need, and one MRT-stop to the new 'Jewel' airport building (which is amazing to visit!) My wife and four-month-old baby enjoyed our one night stay at the hotel before flying out internationally from Changi Airport (which is a short/easy taxi ride away). Best of all, Kumar, an amazing porter, assisted us with a LOT of luggage - all odd shapes and cumbersome, but not for Kumar! With a smile and quick-as-you-please scoop, Kumar helped us immensely! Worth the visit for Kumar alone!

title: Flight stopover
desc: Really good for an overnight stopover. One stop on the MRT, with shops and restaurants adjacent. The room was very comfortable and quiet, everything worked well. The lap pool was nice to stretch out for a quick swim.

title: Very very nice!
desc: Very nice hotel in the middle of wonderful amenities (e.g. dining). Location next to MRT station is superb. Staff were friendly, personable, hospital. Bath amenities are OUTSTANDING - the shampoo, body wash, etc. had just the right formula - high fragrance, not drying at all unlike the amenities in some other hotels.

title: Good Hotel
desc: I have a good experience staying in Park Avenue Changi Hotel. The hotel is comfortable and very close to all the amenities. The staff is also very helpful. I like that this hotel is walking distance to Changi City Point mall, Singapore Expo and MRT.

title: One of my favourite hotels in Singapur
desc: I’m so glad that my company have chosen the Park Avenue Changi Hotel for me to stay whenever I am I’m Singapore. Rooms are great, staff is very nice and helpful and the service is always top! Always happy to stay with you! Best regards A. Elmazi

title: Not convenient, prefer as your last choice
desc: You pay the same price, however the facilities are different. They cant provide a room with one queen bed in place of 2 single beds. And surprisingly that would come with additional price. Breakfast choices are mere missing basic continental breakfast options

title: Clean and Comfortable
desc: Staff needs to be more helpful while carrying luggage of the guests. Very professional staff otherwise. Food is expensive and better food is available near by. Gym and swim area is clean and well taken care of.

title: Cold food.
desc: Lack of restaurant. Cold breakfast. As the breakfast “restaurant” is outside only. They use huge ceiling fans. Resulting in stone cold breakfast due to the downdrafts. Tiny gym. With only rundown equipment. Single person pool.

title: Excellent Staff & Convenient Location for Singapore EXPO
desc: The Park Avenue Changi staff, especially Kumar, provided excellent service. Muhammad and Natasha were also helpful. The location is wonderful if you are attending a convention at the Singapore EXPO, where I was attending Echelon Asia Summit 2019. The hotel is only 1 stop away from the airport, a 4 minute ride on the MRT. You walk out of the station and Park Avenue Changi is almost right in front of you. The EXPO is also a very short walk away, which makes it very convenient. If you want do a bit of shopping or grab a bite to eat, the Changi City Point mall is next door. You can have meetings there as well.

title: Good for Business Travel in CBP area
desc: Hotel looks clean but the hallways are smelly. Pictures may be a bit deceiving as furnitures are now in old condition - bath area has molds and mildew. Should be checked by management every so often. Door doesn't lock by itself you have to make sure you pull it close to ensure privacy. It is a good place to stay if you are on business within the area. Price is higher than the rest of the hotels within the same standard.

title: Excellent accomodation
desc: Good service by the staff. Clean environment.Well situated . Looking forward to stay they in the near future.Only setback is the parking . Very dissappointed for charging the guest for every exit he takes. Should be free for hotel guest . Hope to hear that from the manageme soon

title: Very good quality
desc: The room is spacious and clean at a reasonable price. The bed is comfortable. The staff is nice and friendly. Great location, very close to the EXPO, the mall, MRT and airport. I would stay here again.

title: breakfast and payment system to be improved
desc: Breakfast is not good for Chinese people, the option of Chinese food is too less regarding the high rate of Chinese customer. Payment system is not friendly to Chinese since the hotel doesn't accept union pay.

title: Good as an Airport Motel
desc: Arrived after an 8hr journey. Room and sheets were clean. Bathroom needed a good scrub with exit mould in the shower and the water from the shower goes all over the floor. Room service was OK but cold when it arrived and I thought it was expensive for what it was.

title: Stayed on 20th to 22nd
desc: Rooms were good except for the sink. Water from the tap takes a long time to drain from there. No bottled water provided as a separate tap in the bathroom functions as drinking water.So if one is looking to chill their water in the fridge it would be quite a hassle. My only complain was on the morning before checking out at 5:49 am I called reception to ask for a late check out and was told of the high occupancy which wasn't true as when my wife checked in there weren't many people even staying at the hotel. The front office staff at that time, Fred was not accommodating and was lacking phone etiquette even slamming the phone after the conversation, much to my horror. Absolutely rude. I was hoping to return in the near future before I experienced such service. Now I'm not so

title: Great Staycation
desc: Clean and comfortable hotel. Great for staycation especially for family. Nearby shopping mall. Many choices of food available nearby the hotel. Hotel is also near to the mrt and it is just a station away to changi airport.

title: Helpful staff
desc: Been staying at this hotel on May2019. Its a nice n comfortable place to stay, clean and tidy room. Strengic location with nearby the MRT station and a mall. I would like to said thanks to a staff call SHAFIE, he is really helpful and friendly

title: Visiting Singapur (Park Avenue Changi hotel)
desc: I was here for a business trip and the service in the hotel was excellent. The people who work in the hotel are very kind, specially one of the employees called Muthalip Bellman. He was always extremely helpful and ready to assist me in anyway I needed.

title: Birds in the food, 11 dollar paper cups
desc: Have to say the buffet breakfast food is not bad. Which is probably why this outdoor breakfast has plenty of birds scavenging for food directly from plates. They won't attack while you're there but if you step away for cutleries or to fetch a drink, there's a good chance your food will be attacked. Obviously, they also leave droppings, mostly on the floor but also on the chairs. A particularly distasteful experience is when they charged for a takeaway coffee from the buffet. Which might have been fine if I was told I would be charged but for that price, there's much better coffee nearby. Try huggz. They also really took their time with it.

title: great location
desc: great location. close to changi city mall with many shops and restaurants. walking distance to NTUC Fair Price Supermarket. walking distance to train station. room is clean and comfy and staff are helpful and friendly.

title: Nice hotel and helpful staff
desc: Ideal location 3 mins walk from mrt and great views. Very helpful friendly staff. My fave hotel in Singapore, one of the best hotels in Singapore. The bell man Muthalip is very helpful. Keep it up! Will come back again.

title: Great location comfortable stay
desc: Great location adjacent to a shopping mall with brand outlets, 2 supermarkets, many eating stalls and 2 MRT lines Comfortable room with complete amenities incl ironing equipment that can cover all your needs for a stay

title: Perfect if u only here for expo
desc: A stones throw away from expo and the metro - a couple of stations away from Changi so its perfect if ur only in Singapore for the expo and nothing else. The room is quite spacious with a mini kitchen, living room and a tub. There is a mall nearby with supermarket and foodcourt - Songfa also here! But its really quiet after 10pm and nowhere to go for drinks.

title: Great hotel to stay in!
desc: Hotel was located near the MRT and shopping mall. Service was great and we were also given a free upgrade! Rooms was clean and equipped with basic necessities. Would definitely come back again for more staycation!

title: Awesome service
desc: The bellman Muthalip was exceptional in his service and the handy smartphone provided for free allows nationwide unlimited data and unlimited free calls locally and internationally. If only i had known earlier i would not have purchased the local SIM

title: Cozy, clean and great location
desc: Enjoyed staying in this hotel. The rooms area small but ok. Not the best if you like working from the hotel and spreading documents out as the work space is tight. The hotel is located very near an office precinct and shopping centre that seems to have everything. This makes it quiet at night. Breakfast is ok but restaurant is open air so a little uncomfortable if the weather is hot or muggy. Front counter staff are excellent. Restaurant staff are average. The bell man (Muthalip) can fix almost any problem and provided a warm welcome and goodbye,

title: cozy and comfortable
desc: The staff was friendly and courteous. Muthalip, the bellman was particularly helpful and from the very first day provided lots of assistance and support. He was like an old friend who went out of his way to make sure that I felt at home even though I was so far away from home. Thanks Muthalip...for making my stay memorable!

title: Service to be improved
desc: Classic business hotel but service yet to be improved, especially staff knowledge on their own hotel policy. I was very disappointed over my room service ordering experience, staff was not helpful, not intended to help, I had to make an attempt to convince the staff before we get our order taken, while clearly the restaurant was fully open and operational.

title: Excellent comfy room with all amenities
desc: We had a king size bed and a really nice quiet room. The free phone to call anywhere in the world was a real bonus. Tea and coffee in room was welcome but only creamer sachets, no fresh milk. Very helpful reception staff. Good security and safe in room. Close to Expo station and a shopping mall. Give cafe a miss! Room was very clean EXCEPT for athe mold around the bath!! Needs a good bleach spray and it could be removed. I am asthmatic and allergic to mould. NOT HYGENIC!

title: Pretty good business hotel
desc: Stayed here already couple of times. Since the latest renovation on ground floor with own breakfast area you get pretty good value for money. Also location is very good - close to airport and many companies / exhibition centre, but as well as to the Changi point mall. In the mall you get all you need and the food court is also quite nice for a quick bite. Will stay here in future for sure again.

title: Strategy Location, Spacious Room and worth for the stay
desc: Hotel is near to Expo MRT station, CityPoint shopping mall, FairPrice Extra. Easy for transportation either MRT or Grab car and food seeking. Room is spacious, clean. But the toilet bowl is bit shaking, not stable. Breakfast is okay, few dishes changed but overall are the same every morning.

title: Value for money hotel for family stay!
desc: Our family of 5 (hubby, 3 daughters aged 8, 4 and 1.5 years, and I) had an impromptu staycation at this lovely place in the east of Singapore. We had originally wanted 2 connecting rooms but were given adjacent rooms instead. The concierge was very accommodating and upgraded us to the 2 bedroom suite without extra cost :) Hubby and I were pleasantly surprised, to say the least and kids were thrilled! The suite is as is in the pictures, picture perfect and very well kept. Amenities were in place, with cooking facilities, utensils and crockery available so we can stay in and cook. A huge supermarket is next to the hotel so we could get all groceries that we needed. All in all, it was an extremely wonderful experience. In my daughter's words 'it's like a mini home and is the best

title: Good value, but horrible breakfast
desc: As said in the title, this hotel offers good value. It all crumbles with the restaurant/bar. Greasy omelette prepared by people who probably come from Singaporean/Chinese hawker centers. Is wholesome food and good coffee too much to ask?

title: Spacious room and excelent location
desc: Room is big and near the MRT station. We can go everywhere using EW or Downtown line. Many restaurant and shops. Services are good however the breakfast is terrible. Not delicious at all and same food everyday.

title: Post staycation survey
desc: Spacious, Clean, well organised,Comforting Suite, suitable for family staycation. Location wise is great as its quiet,peaceful and away from Urban For Muslims patrons, The hotel did not provide Halal food but do not worry, NTUC & other Halal eateries available nearby.

title: Recent stay at Hotel Changi park Ave
desc: I spent 3 nights at this hotel. Very good service from Hotel at Park Avenue. The bellman Muthalip, who assisted in baggage and taxi service is very polite and friendly. The staff responds to queries and are quite helpful. The staff in general are polite and helpful. The hotel offer a quiet ambience and persons will enjoy the quietness. The foods served for meals need more variety .however. I would recommend this hotel to persons who are travelling t0 Singapore. It is ideally located to the airport and so one does not have to worry about missing flights. The staff acted promptly to request and Muthalip is always smiling and offering assistance. He is a very good worker.

title: Excellent for our requirements
desc: We booked a month’s stay at this hotel. Delighted to find that we had a shopping mall on our doorstep not to mention the MRT. We used the bar attached to the hotel most evenings for happy hour but ate in the shopping mall food court where there was plenty of choice from local, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Indian and western food. Having armed ourselves with travel cards we could get into the city within half an hour or try unknown parts of the island by bus. No fare was more than £2. It was even only 50p to take the MRT to the airport! The pool on the tenth floor is described as a lap pool and it was just that, but really only wide enough for one person to swim at a time. Surrounding floor got very hot so flip flops essential. Laundry facilities on this floor by the pool

title: Great place to stay
desc: Park Avenue is a great place to stay for work as well as holiday. Writing this review to share my appreciation for the hotel staff who are super helpful. I had twisted my ankle, and needed help. The staff at the reception helped me even with a crutch to walk. Muthaliq at the reception, is a great guy, very friendly...he came up to my room and helped me with a crepe bandage that helped me recover over the weekend and put me back on my feet.

title: Review of recent stay at the Park Ave Hotel and Spa
desc: Muthalip was the most outstanding support offered at this Hotel. He was not only amicable and polite but helpful in responding to queries regarding taxis, location and guidance on the use of the Handy man phone. Whenever he was around one felt that there was someone on hand to help just as if we had known him before. He therefore made this stay a good experience. I would commend Muthalip to anyone needing support in a country away from home because he make one feels that he or she is genuinely being cared for and that your best interest is at heart. The hosts at the from desk were generally pleasant but Muthalip is definitely the most outstanding involved and pleasant team player. Winnie Berry Room #438 April 21 - 25, 2019

title: Close to my work location and surrounded by malls and food courts
desc: While not a fancy hotel it had a really good breakfast, self laundry service and the rooms were spacious, clean and modern. Staff really nice. Just FYI breakfast and restaurant are same place outside no air con. Gets pretty warm in the meals. 7 Singapore dollars from the airport by Grab (uber) would definitely recommend it. Nice pool. Floor 9 is the top floor and having a room under the poool you could hear the water or people jumping in, it closes by 10pm so it does not really bother but FYI in case you’re bothered by this ask for other section or floor

title: 2nd stay here and even more satisfied
desc: this is my second staycation at Park Avenue @ Changi and I'm really really pleased with the entire hotel and friendly staff! previously booked the wrong room via agoda, therefore I had to email the hotel directly and they were extremely helpful to upgrade me to a deluxe room (with charges of course but I didnt mind as it was my fault for being careless). upon checking in, me and my partner was given a complimentary upgrade to a suite!! it really was a great surprise for me as I choose this hotel for my belated birthday staycation. As usual, the room was great, everything is so clean and well working. only downside was that the bathtub for some reason kept leaking, making the bathroom wet. but that's not a big issue to us anyway. Also asked if we could get a slightly

title: 3 day business tour
desc: nice and comfortable.. close to all the basic amenties and link up lines for movign aroung CBP and towards the city center. the new F&B place serves well to have a nice sumptous breakfast and start the day on a positive note.

title: NIce hotel
desc: Nice for business trip, near MRT and airport but a little far from other place if wants to go sightseeing. Roof top swimming pool is smaller than expected. If breakfast choice can have more option will be better.

title: Great place and location is plus
desc: It was a great experience and the staff was warm and helpful. Clean rooms and great food service. Would recommend to pick for you stay at Changi area. A very thoughtful feature was the free local mobile phone that you can use to explore Singapore and can carry with you to stay connected in case you do not want to use you own phone international roaming service. Quite thoughtful!

title: Average
desc: Everything was average. Peoplpe, food, rooms. Nothing worth reporting. Mouldy tiles in teh bathroom. Low level of fitness stuff. Pool really just a large bathtub. Staff could not deal with any issues.

title: Very Disappointing: Profits over Customer Care
desc: I made a booking and it entered the nonrefundable period after booking. Unexpectedly, my spouse was diagnosed with cancer and a course of chemo prescribed that clashed with this trip. I contacted my airlines and other hotels to cancel/make changes to the arrangements and sent supporting documentation to prove the case. All were understanding and all suppliers made changes/allowed me to cancel fee free - EXCEPT PARK AVENUE CHANGI. Despite working with my agent and then appealing to them directly, they refused to allow cancellation, initially asking for supporting documentation and then still refusing it upon receiving it. This for me is totally out of sync with how companies treat their clients today. It is important that businesses are compassionate and understanding,

title: Singapore Business Trip
desc: Not worth for value for money, Room is congested and not convenient to use basic operations like lights and bath room looks old, lot of black spots on the tub. No response for the phone Breakfast items are very few

title: No comment cause Excellent !
desc: Conclusion everything is excellent Nearby station Nearby market and shopping mall Few food restaurant at hotel downstairs My room type is one bedroom suite - Hotel is super clean - Makeup room services daily - Breakfast is so so (as simple choice)

title: poor service
desc: you asked my onion this is my experience inside the shower room 409 the shower head can’t hold so it was hard to shower and all the grout is full of black scum it wasn’t that clean also I called housekeeping lots of times no answer so I called the front disk many times no answer so I had to go personally to the front dist and asked them for simple bucket of ice, I was wounding if I had health issue and I need an ambulance no one else in my room to take care of me so I could been dead by now so I don’t think I will go there again and I don’t recommend them to anyone.

title: Overnight Stay
desc: Greeting was good - prompt and well organised Departure okay - it took longer than necessary for staff to contact taxi service Response to recovery of lost phone and forwarding to me was excellent The location was good

title: SATISFIED!
desc: Visit here for my birthday surprise tbh I didnt know about this hotel before. The hotel is very convenient. Its near to the Airport, mall and city. Room is clean and neat. Pool is too small. The service is fast and staff is friendly especially Shamin, she treated us like vip and even lead us to the lift and is very helpful. My mum and I loved the chicken wings here but the breakfast is too pricy ): Need to walk a distance to the mall to buy breakfast. Definitely will recommend to my relatives and friends. Satisfied and will visit again!! Thank you for making our stay wonderful (:

title: Amazing service, people, room.....
desc: The rooms are really great. The service is great. Generally people are willing to help you with what you request. There are plenty of restaurants nearby and the metro is just a walk away or the bus or the taxi. Brilliant.

title: Good hotel within vicinity to Singapore Expo/Max Atria, Expo MRT & Convention Centre.
desc: Good location if you have events at the nearby Singapore Expo, Max Atria, Convention Centre or Changi Business Park. Expo MRT is just 2 minutes walk, there’s also a good premium outlet mall called Changi Point nearby too. Will definitely come again.

title: Strategic location near airport
desc: I stayed for a night coz my connecting flight will goes next day to Langkawi. End up Changi after 13 hours cruising from Schipol and arrive hotel early morning. But the hotel staff a very helpful to let me in the room . Surprisingly they upgrade me into their Suite room, room are spacious with living room, kitchenette, washing machine etc. Breakfast was good with large variety of selection. Definitely recommended for anyone who stay for transit in Singapore.

title: One stop from airport - great clean comfy
desc: A great short stay option. Location near airport is great. The hotel is rather new and very comfortable. Downstairs there is a bar and also right nearby many places to eat - both take away and nice Indian restaurant. It is only one stop by MRT to airport... And the Expo area a good place to walk around to stretch legs before next sector flying. Would recommend...

title: Great place and convenient
desc: I really enjoyed my stay and its location was really of convenience and accesible. It was near a mall, the convenience store, mrt, airport and expo; my event location. the faciliities provided was excellent

title: An awesome week !
desc: Good service! Everyone is friendly and helpful ! Especially Kumar ! One of the man in counter who help me to carry my luggage and sharing all the good food around ! Have a great stay in Park Avenue!!! Thank you !

title: Short stay or stop-over is recommended
desc: Hotel location is one station from Changi airport by MRT. Fairprice supermarket & Changi Point Mall are really a stone's throw away from this hotel. Restaurants are in the vicinity. An air con food court is situated on the top floor of Changi Point Mall.

title: no hassles short stay
desc: The hotel is very close to airport (but not so close that there is plane noise), close to ground transport (metro 5 mins away by foot), restaurants (several in nearby malls within 5 mins walk), good room and hotel facilities, everything worked - just the ticket for a short stay

title: 7 weeks stay!
desc: The hotel is clean and elegant and quiet. The room was big enough for two pax. The all the staff are very helpful and accomodating and very friendly esp. kumar. Also the place is very near to a mall, supermarket and train station. My overall stay was a blast. I was able to study and concentrate and focus on what um doing! Thank you Park Avenue hotel!

title: Customer service
desc: Stay for 1 night in this hotel. Love the breakfast selection. Didn't get the bed type that I booked, but it's okay since I just come here for business trip. Much convenience to go to the airport. Wifi can be improve in term of the speed for business guest.

title: Good Comfortable Hotel
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights before flying to London. We have stayed here previously and like the location. Very close to a pretty good shopping centre and just a few minutes from an MRT station. The staff were really helpful, especially Kumar. Close to the airport and not far time-wise from the city via the MRT.

title: Overnight stay
