desc: Hotel very coveniently situated to Changi airport, 10 mins by taxi. Rooms spacious, clean and bed comfortable. All the staff very helpful and we received very good service from Kumar. Hope to come back one day

title: Comfortable and Calm
desc: We very much enjoyed our stay at park avenue, the staff were lovely, the room was excellent and the hotel was very close to some great restaurants and shopping centers. The bathrooms were very clean and well equipped, and although we didnt eat breakfast it looked delicious

title: Nice cosy place
desc: Satisfying to stay that place very convinient with the food and stuff...the staff looks very friendly and serve with pleasure..had a nice cosy place that i stay will visit the place again for the stay cay...thanks

title: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
desc: Stuck up 2 Malay lady at the counter during check in. It's the littlest things that matters most. Worst check in ever. No smiles at all. Not professional. Room was okay for the price that I paid for, I actually got myself a bath tub. Have to add $10 for a queen size bed. Unbelievable. Not looking for an upgrade but come on $10 for queen size you must be kidding me right. Pool is small. Amenities around the hotel area great. Can't find anything 24hrs here. Bar was okay nothing fascinating. No view, far from the city. Room is clean. I was given an end room. I find like the staff didn't do better. Like she was in her own world. Really stuck up. Better add a few bucks and get yourself a 5 star hotel like Jw Marriott, Ritz Carlton, Pan Pacific or Marina Mandarin. Tip top service from

title: Good Transit Hotel
desc: We had two twin rooms. We wanted to stay at the airport overnight to transit between flights. This is nearby just 10 minutes by cab. The cab ride was $7 and quick door to door. The twin beds were very narrow. Most hotels would have super single beds. But this was just single and narrow like a child’s bed. I was worried someone would fall off the bed; unless laying completely still. Other than that, all was clean, tidy, good. There’s a fairprice grocery store 2 minutes walk away and a large mall 3 minutes walk. So very convenient.

title: Sold an inadequate room
desc: I booked a suite for my family of 5. When I arrived I was told that we could upgrade to a bigger suite because the booked room could only accommodated 3 guests, so I had no choice but to upgrade to a two bedroom suite, at my expense.i think that’s called entrapment.

title: Transit Ease
desc: Nice room and bath. Twin beds for one night ok as the bed was quite comfortable. Service was pleasant and location for the airport was excellent. Just a short S9-10 taxi. The hotel is located next door to a shopping center and MRT station so quite convenient. I was transiting to BK the next day so I don't know that much more about the hotel but for my one night stay it was quite nice. Muthalip was very friendly and wanted to make sure my stay was pleasant.

title: Prompt, Delightful and Empathy!
desc: Stayed at this property for 5 nights for temporary transient. very close to the airport and other amenities. Surrounding areas is very quiet at night to have a good pleasant rest at night. Siti from Front Desk was very pleasant in assisting us, she always has a smile on her face. Mr Kumar and Ms Tasha Singh assisted us with a urgent request. I'm so thankful for them! As a whole, if you don't mind the distance, its pleasant place to stay! Thank you Park Avenue!

title: Thanks
desc: What a great hotel near the airport. Missed flight to London ,had overstay. Staff do helpful,especially Muthalip,who helped me navigate my way around the city. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to all my friends Russell

title: Comfort Stay
desc: This is my 2nd time staying in this hotel. Hotel is convenient to my business location. Staffs are good. One of the guest service named Muthalip was very helpful , informative whenever I needed something. Overall stay was pleasant , would definitely recommend this hotel

title: Very Helpful Staff Member
desc: We had just one night/36 hour stopover in Singapore so this was convenient for the airport, but very impressed and grateful for reception staff member Kumar, who helped us hugely in finding out about a city tour that suited our family of four. They also looked after our luggage for the day including a painting we had in hand luggage and he helpfully found a 'fragile' sticker to go on our painting. Room was small but clean and comfortable and this is Singapore after all.

title: Good location
desc: Located bear the airport, just 1 station away, with a shopping mall, a supermarket and many eateries, a good choice for a business. A bit far from the city though. Good amenities even plus ironing board to straighten your shirt.

title: Decent hotel, satisfactory facilities
desc: We had a 2 week stay in a 2 bedroom apartment. It had useful facilities like washing machine, fridge, induction stove. The daily breakfast served was average. Would like to call out one of the staff, Muthalip, who assisted us with the check-out service and helped with putting heavy luggage into the car, as we were shifting to a new apartment. He was kind enough to let us know that we are free to reach out to him whenever we needed help. He was certainly the friendliest person we met there. P.S. Don't expect a feel good and friendly environment. I am starting to understand that's how things are in Singapore. Our expectations in customer service are a tad bit high, as we moved from Dubai, which excels in this aspect. Thanks, Chai

title: Good stay!!
desc: Great stay n very clean room... love the large windows.. the open concept of window facing the bath needs getting used to, but at least there is a curtain that can block the window.. the counter staff could do with a smile when receiving guests.. and the parking will be great if complementary

title: Terrible experimce
desc: Late check out was requested but not processed. Received a call next day saying that I needed to call back to confirm but instructions were not relayed. Staff accessed to my room even after the phone call to ask what time I was checking out. Messages were not relayed clearly. And accessing to my room without Checking if I was in there is terrible !

title: Weekend gateaway
desc: Booked for my daughter birthday staycation. Pleasant stay for a one bedroom suite. Very convenient for hunting of foods. However, the downside is the pool. No children pool. Also, the bath tub in the toilet was too small. Mainly for 1 child at a time. No sharing of bath tub.

title: Convenient to the airport and MRT station
desc: The room was nothing spectacular but it was clean and comfortable. The hotel is conveniently located just a short taxi ride from the airport and a two minute walk to the MRT station. The front desk is manned 24/7, so it doesn’t matter when you arrive back. Staff member Kumar was most helpful and has good local knowledge. The in room tea and coffee is the only downside. Very small quantities of ingredients. No milk provided just powdered creamer (not nice in tea!) ended up buying milk at a local supermarket.

title: Pleasant stay at the Park Avenue
desc: Good business hotel which gives you a handy to stay in connection with all your loved ones and in SG.. good service. the hotel staff was quite obliging barryign the point of not sendng up a scissors upto the hotel room... else the food service for breakfast was quite good... which will add to the service facility of the hotel. A good business stop over which can be for 3-5 days.

title: Nice staycation
desc: Love the room..booked Deluxe Room and got free upgrade to 1 bedroom suite without notifying us, its a pleasant suprise indeed! Room include kitchen to cook, washing machine..2 TVs..1 dining table..and fyi theres dryer machines (need to pay) at top floor/swimming pool floor.. Location is good..1 MRT station to Changi Airport and just steps away from Changi City Point which have many restaurants and warehouse outlet. Will definitely come here again with my family! Recommended!

title: Not up to my standard
desc: Arrived and was confused where to park, so called up the hotel. Subsequently, the hotel was informed that there isn’t any complimentary parking for hotel guest and require guest to buy a $3.20/- parking coupon. Was very disappointed as even the lousier hotels had their own free parking. Checked in and the room is quite dim. Not sure how to tune to TV and it took at least a good half an hour before a maintenance staff came up to help. Asked him on how to tune the Bluetooth speaker and he does not know anything. Checked out the next day and realised that there is only ONE foreign staff at the front desk. Overall, quite disappointed for a staycation and might not come back again.

title: Good hotel and Service
desc: Hotel was near to the airport, taxi drivers though had difficulties to find it. Service in this hotel was good and room was nice too, had everything we needed. Quiet room, you could not hear planes or noise from the street.

title: Four stars
desc: Stayed in Park Avenue Changi over a business trip. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the staff fiendly. The restaurant Cali in the same building offered a good buffet breakfast and dinner in the evening time.

title: Good for business in Changi.
desc: It is close to the airport and the major business center of Changi. There is an MRT station (Expo) across the street and the Changi City Point Mall with a staggering # of food options is a hundred meters or so away. The rooms are typically small, as I find is true in most Asian hotels. The rooms are clean and the wifi service is very reliable and high speed. I was on the 7th floor and well away from the elevator so it was quiet. The hotel restaurant, Cali, has a breakfast buffet and is open 24 hours. Get to breakfast by 7:30 because a lot of tour operators stay here and by 0800 the staff cannot keep up with the folks emptying the chaffers. Get your drink first, then your food. There are a number of fat birds that are not afraid to steal from your plate if you leave it

title: Disappointed with customer service
desc: After a long travel day I arrived at Changi Airport and found a hotel near by, I accidentally selected the option of twin beds instead of a king, the price difference between the two options was a few dollars and I figured I could pay the difference upon check in. When I arrived, I was told the upgrade would cost an extra $20 + + (I have no idea what plus plus means nor did I want to find out) I was better off cancelling my reservation and doing it all over again online, instead I was given the option to push my two twin beds together. Really? For a “world-class” business hotel you would think you would just change my room type considering it was obviously a mistake. Why would a solo traveller request two twin beds? Poor customer service. Extremely disappointed.

title: One stop shop
desc: Had a wonderful stay of 12 days. Neat and clean rooms, next to the Expo SMRT. Very helpful staff, especially Mr Muthalip. Having a mall next to you is of a big advantage. Also there are a lot of eateries around.

title: Great for a Night or Two
desc: My wife and I had a layover at Changi Airport for 12 hours and decided to go out and stay somewhere closer to the city. The hotel is about 5- 10 mins train ride from the airport. The receptionists were helpful and the checking process didn't take more than 5 minutes. The rooms were clean, a little small but it was just perfect for the night. was surprised to find that the lotion, soap and hand-wash were the same liquid from a dispenser in the bathroom (Still have to research on this). The Hotel is 2 mins walk from a few restaurants (if you don't mind eating at low end restaurants). Overall it was a pleasant stay. Would recommend.

title: Services
desc: Location is good. Near to alot of attractions places. Hotel has alot of amenities and is very near to the MRT station. Just that the swimming pool is too small , that's the only disappointing part. And the Hotel room service helper (Zhong Ying) that helped to clean my room, from her accent I knew she isn't from our local country but she spoke very well & fluent English and were very helpful to all of my requests and needs to make my mini celebration turns out smoothly.

title: Nice location, big room, modern n clean
desc: fortunately we got upgrade room to platinum .... everything was excelent. it's like a luxury apartment. you can cook, washing clothes( yess..they have washing machine inside the room), bath tube and even they provide us free mobile phone when we stay here. the check in proccess was smooth n friendly. the bell boy , Mr. Kumar is very nice. and the most important near the hotel you can shopping in the mall like factory outlet, because everything sale on that mall. so I think it's worth to stay here. And near MRT too..so if you want to go to city its easy.. very enjoyable to stay here. definitely will come back here soon.

title: A surprise bday party
desc: I personally work in a hotel line too. To be honest the service was 10/10. Upon check in i was served by the front office named natasha. Hassle free, and fast check in. Got a free upgrade as i wanted the one bed room suite, without hassle natasha actually told me she could give me a free upgrade instead of me topping up addtional amount. The manager syafiq if im not wrong did his job to actually handle the guest needs too, he went extra miles to even carried some of my groceries that i bought to carry up to my room. The room was definitely a plus point for this stay. Definitely the number one hotel in my list and ofcourse ny family members too which they booked this hotel a couple of times too. Will come by again if i got the chance to. Thankyou park avenue chnagi hotel for the

title: Really helpful
desc: I arrived really early, expecting to just drop my bag off for them to look after until I could check in, and they worked really hard to find a room for me to check into. Really felt like they wanted to make sure that I was properly looked after.

title: Location
desc: Location: Selected this hotel predominately due to its location. The location is good if you need to visit the business park or expo area. It takes 2 trains (with a long walk in between) to get from the airport so I would not consider it the best choice for an overnight transit, nor would it be good for seeing the rest of Singapore. There is a decent size supermarket, some restaurants and a shopping centre nearby. Room: Stayed in a superior twin room. The room was quite small, so was the beds. Amenity: No complimentary bottled water. Instead. filtered water is provided on tap in the bathroom. You'll need to being your own bottle if you wanna bring some water with you when you go out in the Singapore heat. Staff: The housekeeping staff struggled to communicate in English

title: Overnight stay
desc: We had an overnight stay at this wonderful hotel, our flight arrived at 06.15 local time and the hotel supplied us with early check and even upgraded the room for us, free of charge! The hotel itself is set close to the airport, perfect for stop off’s in between flights. The staff were very helpful and friendly, no problem too big/ small. Breakfast was adequate and the bar was nice with an area to sit outside. Overall, we had a great overnight stay at this hotel and highly recommend it.

title: nice stay
desc: We stay 3 nights in this hotel. Nice view and nice hotel. When we stay in this hotel it was very pleasant.Rooms are very clean and beautiful. Friendly staff .They provided Free Wi-FI Service.But Swimming pool small.

title: Kumar -Excellent Customer Service
desc: Hotel Facilities and Amenties are important, but the staff that represents the company exemplifies the core value of the business and its customer service. Kumar was brilliant. He was pleasant and lovely but not overbearing. He was respectful.

title: Nice place
desc: hotel environment, room amenities, service all are good. but there is no much options in breakfast menu for Indians/Indian recipes like breakfast served in Anand Bhavan earlier. need an improvement and provide tasty food or give Anand Bhavan option. thanks

title: Great Location, Great Stay
desc: Room check-in was fast and smooth. The room was clean, spacious, and fully equipped with toiletries and amenities. Twin bedroom comes with two single beds, though the bed is rather small but it is comfortable. Location is excellent as it is right next to the Expo MRT station as well as the Changi City Point mall. It's walking distance to the Changi Expo too. Only downside is the room service. Though they advertise a 24-hour room service but it is non-existent. I called at least 5-6 times on the first night to order dinner and no one picks up the phone. Another friend of mine called on a different day to order supper, they took the order, but the food never came.

title: Nice location, big room, modern n clean
desc: have stayed in park avenue for some months for business purposes. It is a no frills business hotel and pretty decent in that respect - clean and a good hotel to stay in if you are working on the east side of singapore. No complaints.

title: Hood place to stay at Business center
desc: Hotel is well placed if you have to work in business center. Its very close to changi city point mall and MRT. Easy to traverse around. Multiple options of food ...esecially for indians right from sarvana bhavan to shakuntala ....all options available. Changi city point mall also have good options for food but better to go by 9pm ..post that many shops starts to shutdown. Good place to take overall strol. Hotel staff is very good n the hotel restairant is open restaurant with fair options of breakfast. Gym is on 10th floor ...not big but have basic equipments. One lane swimming pool is also on terrace and in open. Rooms are clean and the best is its a no plastic bottle hotel. Rooms have taps for drinking water. Its good to carry your own bottles n refill them. Super thought.

title: Excellent Weekend Stay
desc: My 3 nights stayed (8 Nov - 10 Nov 2018) were so wonderful that I was reluctant to leave the hotel on the day of check out. I was given free upgrade to One Bedroom Suites and loved eveything about it. It was so compact and equipped with all the necessary facilities - kitchen, washer, separate living and sleeping areas and it provided all the privacy with the separate dressing and bathroom space. Location is perfect, with 2 MRT lines next to it. Walking distance to Changi City Point and surrounded eateries. 5 minutes drive to Changi airport is ideal for stop over. I would recommend this hotel for its location, cleaniness and comfort.

title: Hotel stops giving bottled water.
desc: Room is clean, and the location is convenient for those who need to attend business conferences at the Changi Business Park or Expo events. However, this hotel no longer provides bottled water for guests. They told you to use their filtered tap water. How do I know this filter is properly maintained, checked and cleaned ? Can I trust the hotel housekeeping or any maintenance staff to do this. No way!

title: Overnight stay
desc: It was a quick stopover between our flights. The hotel is close to the airport, clean and comfortable. Staff are very nice and there was no problem with late check-out and luggage storage. It is located near the small shopping mall with selection of food and coffee. It is also very close to MTR station.

title: Great Location and Services
desc: What I liked about it: - the free mobile device provided that allowed me to have internet access and make calls back home. - the location, I was there for a work and this hotel is just a train stop away from the airport. -bed was super comfy. What I wished could be better: -The pool was small (single lane) -The breakfast wasn't amazing. This was because I was told by reception that it was an American breakfast and it was nothing like that.

title: 2 months flew by
desc: No better location if one has to be in Changi. To: * Ms. Lamei and the entire housekeeping staff * Kumar Kumar (concierge and all round awesomeness) * Muthali P (concierge) * Ms Siti Natasha (Front Office) * Ms. Nurul Huda(FO) * Timothy Yam(FO) Thank you from the bottom of my heart for going above and beyond to make me feel at home. I'm sure I missed a few names here.. the 2 months I stayed at PA Changi, truly home away from home. Your professionalism and high standards of service will not be forgotten. Keep up the great work. Cheers!

title: Friendly, helpful, and relaxed
desc: The bed was comfortable, breakfast was nice, and the staff were very helpful, especially a chap by the name of Muthalip who made sure my travel arrangements were okay and that the bar served me a cold beer.

title: Closeness to Changi airport is it’s main selling point.
desc: Located in a office park next to Changi Point mall and the Expo MRT station this is a business hotel which also caters to overnight stays due to its proximity to Changi airport - only one MRT stop away. Very handy to all the outlet stores in the mall, but don’t expect any frills. We stayed here for two nights in an Executive suite as an alternative to staying downtown which was busy and our regular hotels had ramped up prices for the Grand Prix weekend. There was a positive story in the Singapore Airlines magazine which pointed us to them. Good Points - Close to the MRT from where you can get all over Singapore and to the airport. In room washer dryer. Lots of cafes, restaurants and outlet stores in the mall next door. A two person lap pool and a gym on the top floor. Not so

title: 5 Star Customer Service.
desc: I stayed for just over a week at this hotel and from start to finish everything was outstanding.My flight came into Singapore very early and well before check in time but upon request the hotel had my room ready three hours before normal check in time. The rooms are superb and spotlessly clean and are serviced daily. During my visit it was my partners birthday and i requested champagne glasses and ice bucket to be delivered to my room,that was done promptly and at no extra charge.On delivery of those items the kind lady from housekeeping,seeing that it was a special day for us, delivered a lovely fruit bowl to us again at no extra charge. Fantastic attentive customer service all the way. I would like to mention and thank Kumar, the hotel concierge and his colleague the lady from

title: Great stay & convenient location
desc: The room is spacious and very, very clean, and well stocked with amenities. If you book the suite, it comes with a kitchen that's well equipped too — a induction stove, pots & pans, a knife, cutting board, cutleries, a toaster, a kettle and a coffee maker. There's also a washing machine that's easy to use. Location is easily one of the best — close to the airport, the supermarket is just right outside the hotel & the nearest mall is just 3 minutes walk away. Service is top-notch. Professional, friendly, efficient & helpful. When we had a problem with the induction stove, the help came almost immediately & he was very patient answering our queries. Would definitely come back to stay again!

title: Very convenient location and exceptional customer service
desc: Rooms were very clean. Gym and lap pool facilities quite limited but suitable. The outstanding service from the staff was of the highest standards. Mainly like to thank Mr Kumar who helped assisted with our stay for 3 weeks - he was always polite and very professional handing our queries and providing us with info on things to do and places to visit / eat whilst in Singapore. This made our stay most enjoyable, thank you.

title: Accessible and Convenient
desc: The room is clean and they make sure that they will clean it up everyday. There was once that I left the hotel and don't have the intention to let them clean my room. They called me up and wrote a letter that they weren't able to clean it up because of the hotel sign "Maybe Later" that I left on the door knob. The staff are friendly and accommodating. They also provide umbrella to their hotel guests when it rains. Its internet is FREE. The hotel is near Singapore Expo Hall. It is a convenient for food since it's near Changi City Point Mall. It's also near Mass Rapid Transit station.

title: Bath old and moldy :(
desc: The bathroom needs more cleaning, and to be more modern. Removing the old tubs would be best. TV screen size is small, its like either 24” or 32”. The room is not big nor too small. Breakfast selection is limited but food taste okay.

title: Great business stay
desc: It was a good stay. I was there for business meetings and its location is perfect for me to take the mrt or the bus easily. Best part is that the airport is just 1 stop away using mrt. I fly in and out a lot while i stay in Singapore hence this worked for me. I did not eat here as there is so much to eat outside. Breakfast is for sgd25 plus taxes. I was not ready for that kind of over spend. Just walk out and you will see so much to choose from.

title: So close to airport and convention centre
desc: Conveniently located about $7 taxi or one stop on the train from Changi airport. Also walking distance to mall and super market. Clean, modern and reasonable breakfast so verall good value hotel option in Singapore.

title: Thank you for your help!
desc: Great room great staff. My GF stayed in this hotel on her birthday due to her work. I sent an email to Park Avenue to help me arrange a little surprise for her. Their staff were very helpful with my inquiries and they do extra miles. They helped me to buy ice cream, chocolates and add extra fresh fruits and birthday card. The surprise went well and she was very happy. Thank you Park Avenue changi for a great hospitality :)

title: 3 Nights Stay in Park Avenue Changi Hotel
desc: The service is very nice, Especially Kumar is so good and very warm hospitality from the team. This is the first time to visit Singapore and they show me how the transportation and where to visit. Very professional and will visit again

title: Overnight for airport
desc: We stayed here for a short time as an alternative to the airport hotels. It’s conveniently next to a large mall for food and last minute shopping before heading home. We’d stayed 2 weeks before in a city hotel as we were using Singapore as a hub for a big family trip. PA Changi were nice enough to store a whole bag of winter stuff before our stay which made our travelling much easier. Unfortunately their pool was under maintenance and there were no alternatives for adults (and none for kids as the outdoor water playground at the mall was shut too) but we weren’t at the hotel long enough for this to matter

title: Well worth it and amazing staff
desc: Booked 8 rooms in total and the Japanese guests were extremely pleased with the facilities and how clean the rooms were. At such an affordable price, closeness to the MRT/ airport and the quality of rooms, I will recommend this hotel to any Traveller. Furthermore, We especially satisfied by the exceptional service Mr Muthalip has provided! From booking taxis to the purchasung of attraction tickets. Couldn't have asked for better service. Arranging transport for such a big group was extremely stressful but Mr Muthalip made the process a lot easier. If anyone should get a promotion or a pay raise, it should be this gentleman.

title: Review depends on purpose of your visit
desc: If you are a tourist, don't stay here as it is in a business park close to the airport, however a distance from the real Singapore. If you are a business traveller as I was, and for a short period it was very good. Room was nice size, with nice bathroom, fridge and safe. Small fitness centre with good equipment and a small lap pool for your fitness needs. The hotel is located close to the transit system and I understand it takes about 40 minutes to get to downtown Singapore. Staff were excellent and assisted with any request very promptly. There is very little around with the exception of a large mall with shops and countless restaurants. Its a 5 minute walk. This property has a very nice bar / restaurant on site. It is both outdoor and indoor. We had dinner the second night and

title: My 1 month stay!
desc: I had my 1 month stay at Park Avenue Changi Hotel and it was a great experience! The staffs were very helpful (always ready to help). One of the staff, Muthalip, really helps us out when we're departing for the airport (keeping our luggages in check at the lobby)

title: Great Hospitality
desc: We only stayed here one night, but the hotel was lovely and clean, hotel staff friendly and helpful. I would like to hightlight concierge staff namely Muthalip for his excellent customer service rendered. Good job!

title: Excellent stay(s) at Park Avenue
desc: Had an excellent stay here at Park Avenue. Very very good location as we were in Singapore for a wedding and had 2 separate bookings with Park Avenue (19th -21st & 22nd-25th) as we stayed at the venue of the wedding the night of. Park Avenue is Right beside Expo metro station, right near a shopping centre with various stores/places to eat, a convenient Supermarket, as well as a McDonald's and Burger king which is pretty much attached to the Hotel for my fellow North Americans. The best perk of this Hotel is that it is 5-10mins away from the airport! I Highly recommend this hotel based on overall services and location The only cons of this trip was: 1.) I requested a "large" bed months prior through Agoda as we were travelling as a couple, but due to the occupancy we had 2

title: Close to airport but far cheaper stay
desc: We wanted a stopover hotel as we were flying on next day. The hotel was lovely modern and clean, no crowds and very comfy beds and nice and quiet. Lovely staff. Only one stop from airport. Getting the train very easy. You have to buy day trip tickets from machine and you must have cash for this. ATM was nearby. Choice of language made it so very easy to buy return ticket. Cost was approx Sgd $ 2.60 return pp. Hotel can be seem when you walk out onto the street. Restaurant at the hotel but we went to shopping mall. First floor food mall but you need cash here as well. There is a supermarket straight across from hotel.

title: Nice stay
desc: Very nice stay. Friendly and smiling staff. Ideally located. Super connectivity. Nice place to stay, Recommended. Access to to the malls and the metro, and taxis available anytime on call. Food court in the mall has a great variety of cuisines, good experiments with food.

title: Perfect place away from home
desc: I had an awesome time at Park Avenue Changi (PAC) Hotel Truely embracing workplace safety and environment friendliness with continuous flow of clean, filtered drinking water, and NO Plastic Water Bottles ! The staff were there to assist, always smiling and yet not intruding my privacy Rooms were well kept, and very comfy Nearby amenities included shopping centre, and many food places Speed train station(MRT) and bus-stops within 5min walk I will return to this hotel for a fun stay soon

title: Awesome staycation
desc: Away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Very close to shopping centre, dining places and MRT. (Couple of minutes only). Hotel is clean and comfortable. Staff were friendly and accomodating. Gym and swimming pool too. Nice! Had a relaxing and enjoyable stagnation.

title: Very comfortable, pleasant business trip
desc: This hotel is ideal for business trips. it has all the amenities you could want. The breakfast range is very broad. The rooms are clean and comfortable. WIFI is reliable and the staff couldn't be more friendly and accommodating. Located on a business park, close to a shopping mall to various shopping and food outlets and close to Expo MRT station.

title: Family Holiday Stay
desc: Stayed at Park Avenue Changi from 13/6 to 18/6 for Hari Raya Holidays. We stayed in the 2-bedroom suite. I loved that it was very convenient that there were induction stoves and a fridge provided. The room with the two single beds were cosy but slightly cramped. I’d have to applaud the aircon system as the room was always cold. The rooms were always clean and tidied well after we’d come back from house visits. Plus points to Kumar, the concierge, who attended to our needs and requests with a smile. I’d say that his attitude towards guests are as positive as they come. Please fix a hose for the toilets though, its quite inconvenient to use the shower head to wash up after, and not everyone uses toilet paper. Will definitely stay here again. Highly recommended for families

title: Good hospitality in Park avenue hotel
desc: Hi , I am the frequent traveller to Singapore and the preferred hotel in SG is park avenue . The only main reason why i am preferring PA is 1. Rooms with Kitchenete. I have never felt that I am staying in hotel and it gives me the feeling of staying in service apartment. 2. Handy mobile helps to connect with many of family of my family and friends who are out of Singapore . Mind that the internal calls are free with unlimited calls and data . 3 support staffs are kind enough and very supportive . Particularly Muthalip (bell boy ) support is awesome, easily approachable and gives more details in and around hotels . He shows good disciple in nature . The only improvement area which comes to my mind is restaurant . Complementary breakfast in Cali restaurant is not Indian friendly

title: Good stay
desc: Good location. Good to office and business. Safe location. Reasonable price tag. I am frequent visitor of Singapore. I always stay here. Good service. Would love to stay again here. Good if get reward points.

title: Cosy, clean and comfortable.
desc: This hotel is cosy, clean and comfortable. The room is adequately equipped with everything you would need. The bed is very comfortable and has excellent pillows. The hotel is in a very convenient location with the airport, trains and buses very close by. There is also a shopping mall very close by. There is a restaurant attached to the hotel and also plenty of other eateries close by. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Although it is situated in a business park close to transport etc. it is very quiet. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Client service
desc: Excellent Client services , room services are very much appreciated .....staff hospitality is good especially the service boys : Mutalip and kumar were very kind enough to take care of the customers and very helping nature ..

title: Outstanding Service
desc: From the moment I arrived, the staff at the Park Avenue Changi Hotel were OUTSTANDING. Muthalip, the Concierge, has helped me immensely in organsing sightseeing trips as well as other things. The room is beautiful. The hotel is 10 minutes from the Airport, near the train station and a mall. Restaurants are everywhere. Would happily come back and recommend to other travellers.

title: Nice Stay @ Park Avenue
desc: A nice hotel situated in Changi Business park and I had a stay of around 5 days at this venue to attend some business training. We were given early check in & late checkout and front office staff were very helpful and supportive. Stayed and executive Deluxe room which was nicely furnished and had good space.All necessary items including some essential cooking-ware were available at the room and a washing machine. Hotel has a very small pool in the rooftop & a gym. Restaurant is also a small one and we had breakfast everyday.Breakfast buffet was small and had little variety but tasty was good.Restaurant staff were also very friendly and helpful. You can find several good shopping malls in the nearby area including changi city point.Several food courts with various food also

title: Nice crew!
desc: Nice hotel, the airport is at 10 minutes in taxi and there's a train station and a mall next to the hotel. The people working there is very nice (Receptionist Shakie is a tireless and helpful worker!) , and the breakfast was good also! The only upsidedown is that it might be a little close to the airport: if you have issues sleeping and plan to stay for long better pack your earplugs!

title: Unexpected customer service from housekeeper
desc: We were planning for a family staycation and decide on this hotel due to its proximity from where we lived in Singapore. Originally, we wanted to book another hotel that was next to Changi City Point. However, we were rebuffed due to the fact that we have children and booking one of their supposed premier rooms. With children, it tends to be a little tricky. We asked for housekeeping services during our stay. Our housekeeper, Ms Kang Di, came by a couple of times to ensure our room was well-kept. She always kept a smile on her face and such a gesture does make it easier during our stay here. I would like to thank her, and the front desk crew for being so patient and caring. Definitely coming back here again! Keep up the good work Park Avenue Changi!

title: Very convenient, lovely staff
desc: Front desk staff (Duty Manager Manzour and GRO Athirah) were very friendly and helped us out on a couple of things. Thank you! Hotel is very convenient to restaurants, supermarket and MRT. Would recommend to other travellers!

title: Went short staycation while running an event there
desc: Very friendly and efficient staff from all grounds be it at the hotel or for the event! Really enjoy my short stay and what’s good ? Ntuc (supermarket), dining cafes, fastfood and Malls are nearby! And it’s a stone throw from mrt . No need to worry about rainy weather

title: Park Avenue Changi
desc: Nice room and amenities and pleasant place to stay in. The office is near the vicinity of the hotel. Changi City Point Mall is near to the hotel which gives many options for shopping and trying new cuisine

title: VERY COMFORTABLE HOTEL
desc: this hotel is very comfortable and convenient for the business park. Kumar (one of the reception staff) is especially helpful and most courteous. The CALI restaurant has recently opened and is excellent. The rooms are very pleasant

title: Good hotel, great stay experience experience
desc: room is spacious and well lit. one key advantage is that I was given a complementary mobile for for use during the stay. honestly it is really thoughtful and considerate of the management. very useful for short term travelers. lot of dining options nearby if you don't like the in-house restaurant..

title: Park avenue Changi hotel. A good stay
desc: Comfortable room with kitchenette. Outside city, however close to Airport. I enjoyed the pool and gym on the roof. It’s also alongside a small mall which has a grocery store and a nice food court. A phone(handy)was provided, which was very useful to make local and international calls absolutely free of cost. This was a very nice feature. The staff were extremely helpful and polite, accommodating throughout my stay. Rooms were kept clean and tidy whilst there.

title: Not so great.Can stay if you get for reasonable rates
desc: I have stayed in this hotel for over 30 days. Advantage: proximity to many IT companies in changi business park.There are not many hotels around this area. The gym is small but good. Housekeeping staff is very courteous. Disadvantages: Can be categorized as a below 3-star hotel. Generally, in singapore staff rarely smile at you. may be due to work pressure. In park avenue its extreme, Front desk staff never look at you or smile at you, You always feel like an unwelcomed guest. Looks like none of them are trained hospitality staff, Anybody can get a part-time receptionist job. At least that is what I felt. Complimentary Breakfast is pathetic,(but better than Capri by Frazer which is close by, I even got stale food from Capri once ). In Park Avenue, i noticed that they even

title: Good location for Singapore Expo
desc: We attended an event at the Singapore Expo and decided to stay in the area. The last time we attended a similar event, we had booked a hotel near Orchard Road. Orchard Road is a good place to stay for shopping and most of the chain, luxury hotels are there, but if you are attending the expo, you would want to stay near it. Instead of lining up for hours for a cab and or space on the subway, you just walk across the street and Park Avenue Changi is there. It was a very convenient location. Pros: location, proximity to the airport, clean rooms, friendly staff, breakfast is available, gym and pool Cons: very basic facilities, very small pool, nothing much to do around the area, breakfast was not very good

title: Not enough
desc: The hotel is in a good location, 10 minutes away from Changi and right opposite an outlet mall, a huge fair price and most important the mrt. That's it. Eventhough the rooms are of a good size, if you get assigned one located opposite the convention centre, you won't be able to open the curtains...picture attached. The lobby doesn't have a toilet, you heard it. You can use Burger King's... If your room is not ready, there's no place where to hang out if not outside, where they have placed a plastic garden sofa...If it rains the cushions will be removed, making it possibly even less comfortable. Breakfast is ok, even though they are unable to make a plain omelette. No aircon in the breakfast room, you can wave your make up goodbye. Never again.

title: Lovely Stay
desc: It my first time staying at Park Avenue Changi, Having a business trip for few days. Few mins from shopping mall, supermarket & also subway station. Friendly staff at the concierge always smile and also i would like to thank Mr Shafie for helping me, will return to this hotel when i come back to Singapore.

title: No Service Standards
desc: I agree with most bad reviews here, if there were other choices, no one would want to stay here. I’d give a one star, but at least the rooms were clean. First, the weirdest thing they have is that breakfast is served at an outdoor stretch every morning. I had to battle mynahs trying to steal food while covered in sweat due to the heat. Seating of course is very limited, and sometimes there simply isn’t enough space for guests to sit comfortably. Second, service standards are spotty. I request for two alarms every morning consistently for a whole week, 6am and 6.30am, and consistently I get only one at 6.30am. I booked for 5 nights, and when I arrived, they gave me my booking for 6 nights. Third, I HATE the cleaning staff assigned to my room. He/She changes my thermostat,

title: Poor hotel, it just the location close to expo convention center
desc: I would take a real 4-5 star hotel and use local transportation to and from the convension. Some examples: poor breakfast, no sweetener in the restaurant/bar although ask it daily, hotel restaurant is in the outside terrace w/o a/c exposed to heat and rain. Rooms are small but clean, bed is ok, however lot of fungus found between the tiles and bath and water valve is shaking. Try to avoid athough price is fair.

title: Lovely
desc: A short stay. We were upgraded to the executive deluxe without me realising it. Thank you so much. The staff, is friendly and approachable. The room is big, clean and great ambience. Near to a shopping mall changi city point. A good and lovely stay.

title: Convenient due near to Expo stn.
desc: Rooms are spacious. Near to Expo station. Near to Fair price supermarket and a big shopping mall. Convenient to stay. Mr.Shaifif at front desk wad so sweet and reaponsible to help. Also one tall Indian staff at Cali bar was awesome. He worked from late night until next morning without failing smile. Thank you,

title: Good business park hotel
desc: If you are here on business in this part of Singapore, great hotel. Staff are excellent, from the concierge, to reception staff, to room service. The rooms are clean. Close to the airport. There is a train station nearby, underground so silent. There is a huge shopping complex with many many oodles of eateries and factory outlets and a supermarket. Large Lap pool and gym on the roof. Location is clean, tidy, busy outside when staff go to and from the station. But not crowded. Made me think of every business park I had been in in NW Sydney, Gold Coast, Macquarie Park. Some aspects of the room are not functional. Well equipped kitchen but PowerPoints in the bedroom/ study. Lounge and 2 smart TVs is good. Wifi was good. If you want somewhere to stay 10 mins from airport and a

title: Nice hotel right next to EXPO
desc: I had a conference at Expo and so stayed here for a few nights. This hotel is not too large in itself, but the room was not small from Singapore standards and was clean. It was nice to have a glass window between the bathroom and the room. The hotel provided a free cell phone but it was extremely slow, so I did not use it. Just one stop from Changi airport and took me a few minutes to walk to Expo, so it was very convenient in terms of location for my needs. However, it is far from the downtown, so I wouldn't have stayed here for tours or for family. I was offered a package with breakfast, which was reasonably nice with many selections.

title: The worst hotel I have stayed ever
desc: Let me start with the good thing about the hotel which is the location. That’s it. There is nothing beyond. I would say they are surviving because travellers don’t have a choice other than two hotels in Changi biz park. First of all the hotel lacks space. There is practically no lobby area. People are asked to wait outside. One can imagine waiting outside for your room in a humid place like Singapore Can you imagine a hotel without a rest room at the lobby/reception area ? That’s park avenue for you. You have to use the public rest room at the mall. The beds are bad. Atleast the one in twin bed rooms. They aren’t stable. When I complained I was asked to upgrade at a charge ! I was not looking for luxury but I was looking for a bed that doesn’t give me a back ache.

title: Very comfortable and convenient
desc: We stayed here the night before a flight from Changi. For an airport hotel, we were not expecting a huge amount, but we were surprised at how large and comfortable the room was. Plenty of space to work, relax, load of wardrobe and storage space and the bed was comfortable. The shower was decent. Around the hotel there is various shopping outlets, and a McDonald's and Burger King. The Expo MRT station is right across the road, Downtown Singapore is around 30 minutes away. $14 SGD taxi to Changi Airport for a mid morning flight, 10 minute drive. I would certainly stay here again.

title: Friendly staff
desc: I travel to Singapore often on business and stay in park avenue mostly because it’s close to my workplace. The front desk staff Nina and everyone are very friendly and supportive, make you feel home, give you quite honest information on where to go party, visit in the city etc. the hotel is quiet, has a 24x7 bar and restaurant, a mall and metro station at walking distance.

title: Singapore hotel close to airport
desc: Excellent hotel located on the Changi business park - train links to the city attractions and the airport - fast food outlets within business park - highly recommend purchasing a Singapore Tourist pass for unlimited use on buses and trains ($20 for three days unlimited use)

title: Convenience, right near Changi airport.
desc: We had an overnight layover in Singapore and wanted a hotel close to the airport. On arrival to Singapore it was a 5 minute taxi trip to the hotel ($27SGD). The hotel is in the business district and was very quiet. There is a shopping mall right next to the hotel as well as great big supermarket which is awesome for a short stay. We discovered that the Expo MRT station was a 2 minute walk from the hotel and only one stop to Changi airport ($1.70SGD for one adult) so used this to get back to the airport. This hotel was also extremely accommodating and allowed us to change our booking even though we had booked a non-refundable booking on booking.com due to the airline changing the date of our flight. Thanks!

title: excellent service from all staff
desc: Rooms are very clean and the location is great. Great service from all staff and very friendly and feel very comfortable to stay. I must comment about the service provided by staff Shafie and Muthalip are un comparable. So professional and personalized.

title: Love the phone
desc: I was only in transit so I didn't buy a local SIM card, but have enough time to explore the city in the afternoon/evening. That's why I was so happy to get to use the cellphone provided by the hotel. It has all the tourist information as well as Google map, so it was very useful. Hotel is very clean, quiet, close to supermarket and some restaurants. Love the stay.

title: Good Hotel
desc: The stay was very good. The staff is very friendly and courteous. The Hotel is located in a business spot very near to the Changi Airport. Mr. Muthalip’s service in helping with the luggage and assisting to the room was excellent. Here is a view from the room.

title: Bathtub - A rarity in standard hotel rooms today.
desc: This is one of the rare and value-for-money hotels that I was able to find a bathtub, especially in the lower category of rooms. This place was designed specifically for business travellers or a simple, mundane stay. Practical design and functional rooms with comfortable bedding. There are no fanciful facilities nor amenities that are worth a mention. Service at reception was also boring with staff seemingly rather disinterested in their surroundings. A property worth considering if you are looking for functionality, have business in the eastern part of Singapore (though there are better options out there or in the area) or if you are looking for a simple, quiet hotel stay.

title: Great overnight stopover for families
desc: Tem minutes from Changi International airport and you arrive at Park Avenue Changi Hotel. Taxi fare $15 SGD one way. We arrived very late and was greeted by a friendly face. Our room was spacious and perfect for a family of 3. All the mod cons were on offer. We liked the complimentary mobile phone to use during our stay. Our wake up call was on time and a taxi waiting for us upon check out. Thank you :)

title: Hotel Staff were extremely helpful
desc: We stayed at this hotel for one month in November/December last year whilst looking for rental accommodation in Singapore. The rooms were comfortable with all amenities and the staff at the hotel were extremely friendly, efficient and went out of their way to look after us. In particular I would like to recommend Muthalip who, at very short notice, helped me to hire a bus to take all of our belongings to the apartment when we moved out, when I had no idea where to start looking for such help. I have been meaning to write the review for several months to commend both the hotel and their staff.

title: Great location
desc: Wonderful hotel near Changi airport and across the street from the metro station. Good shopping and restaurants nearby. Rooms well equipped for long term stays and spacious. Well located for the Expo center just across the street.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Spent 4 days for my first business trip in SG Changi business park area. Take this hotel due to lowest rate offered to the company (need to follow the rule :( )and location not too far away(walking distance within 10 mins). Buffet breakfast included. Plenty of choices and food quality is quite good. Services is good. Staff are helpful and always with smiles. Enjoyed a dinner in the restaurant on the ground floor. Pasta, chicken wings and beer. Enjoyed the atmosphere. Overall value for money

title: Business trip
desc: A good hotel close to airport and in the middle of the Changi Business Park hub, rooms are good and clean, free WIFI is quick and not much lag. There is now the addition of Cafe "CALI" located downstairs in the foyer, the breakfast was well presented and service was clean and efficient, overall very pleasant. Nice to have somewhere close to the hotel to eat.

title: Awesome Concierge
desc: This property is very close to the Expo metro stop, which makes it very convenient. One stop to the Airport, and there is a mall next door. The concierge, Muthalip, was really OUTSTANDING. He booked several activities for my group and saved us a lot of money. We took the cable car to Sentosa Island, and booked some scooter rentals. The scooters were a great way to explore the city. Muthalip got us the scooters for $10 per hour, when other places are charging $30. THANK YOU Muthalip, you helped to make our stay memorable!

title: Nice place nice hotel
desc: It was really very nice and its location is very close to airport, metro service just one minute walking distance nice view. Mr. Muthallip was very helpful and kind. Welcome message at home screen, free cell phone using facilities. i highly recommend this hotel.

title: Good hotel to stay
desc: Good room and prompt service. well maintained. Complimentary breakfast was Good and provision of Handy phone to make calls and WiFi was extremely helpful.front office was courteous and prompt in providing service

title: Nice hotel near MRT station and Changi airport
desc: Nice and clean hotel, conveniently located near Expo MRT Station and Changi airport. It was also close to a mall, restaurants and a supermarket. The room was very comfortable and the reception was very helpful. The TV was interesting. You can order more towels and amenities through it. You can also check arrival and departure flight details. We got in late and left early the following day, so we didn't get to experience a lot of what the hotel had to offer. There was a mobile phone for you to use during your stay but we didn't get a chance to use it. The swimming pool was narrow. There was someone doing laps when we were there and it was pretty awkward to share the pool. Even though our stay was really short, but I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Terrific location, great unobtrusive service, Park Avenue aims to please
desc: wonderful and restful stay. I did not see the teas and coffees though because it's so well hidden and I am not tall enough to see the top of the cupboard. The cleanliness was spot on and the location walking distance to the MRT and the EXPO.

title: Practical!
desc: Very close to the MRT station and the airport, perfect location to visit SUTD, and very kind personnel! I forgot a jacket in the closet and they quickly mailed it to me afterwards. I can recommend it!

title: Really good place
desc: I only stay there 1 night for transit purpose but everything is so nice, out of my expetation. Comfortable bed, when i get into room can see my name in the welcoming screen. Staffs are very friendly. Highky recommended

title: A pleasant surprise
desc: The hotel was clean and the staff extremely polite & helpful. There's a gentleman that stands in the small lobby to ensure all's well. The washing machines and dryers are situated on the 10th floor alongside the tiny pool. Each cycle in the washer and dryer costs $7 each. The Expo station for the Downtown Line is a mere two minutes' walk away, there's a shopping mall, Chinese restaurant, supermarket and food court all within 5 minutes' walk. One teeny tiny complain... the silicon ledge in the bathroom was a bit gross but I'll definitely stay here again.

title: Not so good but so bad
desc: comfort room and great locality but still room service needs to be improved and any communication should be in advance . Morning complimentary breakfast items can be changed on regular basis . Good for short period stay

title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: We had a very pleasant stay at Park Avenue Hotel. We arrived way earlier than check-in time as we were attending a conference at the Expo centre. The hotel allowed us to use the facilities at the swimming pool to freshen up and change. Muthalip gave us excellent service and insisted to carry our luggage for us. We were tired from our 10 hours flight and really appreciated it. On the evening we left he again insisted to help us with our luggage all the way to the railway station. That is really superb service! The only negative was that the restaurant was very busy in the evenings and there was not enough staff on duty. We will definitely recommend this hotel and hope to be back!

title: Good Hotel in Changi Business Park
desc: This hotel is in the center of Changi Business Park and very close to Expo MRT station & Changi City Point mall, so it's easy to buy foods and other business needs as well as to travel around Singapore.

title: Great Option for Travellers
desc: Good location besides the Expo, the Changi Point Mall and MRT. It is quite far from the city if you're looking for nightlife but near to the airport, just 1 stop by MRT or a short 10min Grab ride. Rooms are clean and comfy and staff are very friendly.

title: Not bad!!
desc: If you need a hotel near the Expo then this is a good choice. The rooms are relatively new and modern and comfortable. The internet is a decent quality and speed too. There is a small shopping mall next door with plenty of restaurants inside although most are chain restaurants and not the local Singaporean food which tourists may want. If you are visiting Singapore as a tourist then don’t bother with this place. The location is too far from the city however if you are visiting the Expo, or on a business trip to one of the many companies located nearby, or even looking for an alternative to the airport hotel then this is a good one. It is only one stop from the airport on the MRT train.

title: Great stay
desc: Great room and location. Near MRT for easy access to any where including airport. Staffs are very helpful. Muthalip, Azhar, Nafisha and the team are very knowledgeable. Able to give me information that I'm looking for. Muthalip even showed/ give me great guide on the complimentary use of the cell phone. Thank you Muthalip.

title: Nice place for people on business travel
desc: My stay at Park Avenue was very comfortable. They even help with early check-in. Cali the restaurant is open 24 hours and serves very good options. Just opposite to Changi one and next to expo MRT station.

title: Park Avenue Changi Review
desc: Great location as mall is accessible with food options and supermarket a short walk away. Room is nice and fresh. Staff are courteous and helpful. Filtered water is a plus as well! Aside from that, there is the free Handy phone!

title: Effective and Comfortable
desc: I have stayed in many Convention Centre hotels and most of them skimp on comfort and provide less than the basics. It was nice to have a decent size fridge, a bath (short), a comfortable bed (narrow) and surprisingly added bonuses: a smart phone, with free WiFi and phone data to use while staying in Singapore and a filtered water tap. Well done, Park Avenue!

title: Staycation
desc: Excellent staycation with my family Booked two bedroom suite Room was very clean and staffs were very friendly. Check in was fast with the concerge on duty.Manager Mr manzoor was friendly and was helpful in all the queries. Well recommended

title: Great quality hotel
desc: Hotel condition looks new. Very comfortable. Well located to Singapore Expo and the MRT. It is quite a distance from the city centre. So both time consuming and expensive if you take a taxi. Otherwise I am happy with the hotel. A bit disappointed there was no complimentary bottled water in the room.

title: Great stay
desc: A pleasant room, with appreciated upgrade. Kids camped in the living room. Rooms was spotless and well maintained. Front desk was smooth, efficient and knowledgeable. Convenient and will use again. Well done.

title: Facilities
desc: this hotel is indeed a luxury hotel out of the city area. the staff were very efficient. My fiance had initially booked for a deluxe room for my birthday stay unfortunately the aircon room was faulty..received a complimentary upgrade to one bedroom suite from Duty Manager Manzoor. it just made my birthday stay!! thank you Park Avenue!!! ❤

title: Excellent Staff
desc: Lovely staff. Friendly and helpful in every way. Especially Mr Muthalip. I had a wonderful stay. Easy to find food and very easy to look for stuff. Walking distance to mall and other shops. I really recommend Park Avanue Changi.

title: My stay at Park Avenue Changi
desc: the location is so perfect, the service in all sections is fabulous! The view from the rooms is amazing and helps you get refreshed. Gym is good and is also good but Little smaller than usual. Overall rating: 4.8/5

title: Wonderful and Comfortable stay
desc: I had the most beautiful and comfortable stay in Park Avenue Hotel in Changi Business Park recently. We came with a family of 4 and was recommended to this hotel by Park Avenue's wonderful staff, Jessica Loh. It was a 2 bedroom apartment, 1 with an ensuite and the other room had another bathroom in the main living area. Attached with a beautiful living area, kitchenette and not forgetting a washer and dryer too. This is my 3rd time coming to Singapore and staying in the hotel made my family comfortable and will always want to come back and stay here if we are back in Singapore for the upcoming holidays. It was before Christmas before we checked out the 2nd time, I realised that I locked my luggage and left the keys in it. Without hesitation, the staff and maintenance guys

title: Great hotel with great service
desc: The stay in park avenue was really good. The service especially from Shafie was beyond expectation. From the moment i came, til i went back, everything was excellent. I had an expo nearby, which was only 3 minutes away from the hotel. Other than that, the price for the rooms is good value for money. I booked one deluxe, and one superior, and got upgraded to the 2 bedroom room, which was a pleasent surprise. Totally recommended!

title: A disappointment and not worth the money
desc: The taxi driver from the airport couldnt find the hotel and charged me SGD 30. The swimming pool was closed for renovation, I only booked this hotel because of the pool. Our TV fell off the wall as it wasnt hanging properly on the stand and smashed and the hotel is now charging us for a new TV... I would NOT renommed this hotel to anyone EVER! Im so disappointed with their service!

title: Fantastic service
desc: We had an overnight stay at Park Avenue Changi before flying back to Melbourne the next day. The check in was very quick. We had the free phone offer explained to us even though we didn’t use it. The room was very good overlooking the MRT. Where the fantastic service came in was when we were about to board our plane at Changi airport. My wife realized she had left her phone in the room. This was Monday morning 8-1-2018. I quickly rang the hotel to advise them of what had happened. When we arrived in Melbourne there was a voice mail advising that they had found the phone. As it it was midnight in Melbourne I resumed contact on Tuesday morning. After filling out the required paperwork and paying the courier fee which was less than SGD 30, we received an email advising that the

title: Oceania Powerlifting Champs Official Hotel
desc: Very clean, comfy room with great facilities. Appreciated the air conditioning especially. Very close to venue, supermarket, gym and mall. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Park Avenue Hotel made an excellent base for our sports event.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Very pleasant and lovely staff in “ Park Avenue hotel Changi “. It’s situated at near 5 minutes distant from changi airport. What a great idea for giving data and roaming call mobile facility to totally free. It is very wonderful and thanks a lot to hotel management given such an excellent service. “ Park Avenue hotel Changi “ staff made with me surprise service to carrying my all baggage and things to check-out very easily. Specially I want mentioned Mr. Muthalib give me us to very excellent service. Excellent service. I can rate this hotel as maximum star. * * * * * *

title: Not bad for the price, but does everybody steal stuff?
desc: Very good for Expo site, but there is very little else around there. What we really hated was the staff attitude that we could be treated with disrespect. We were even asked to sign to use the ic e bucket,, see pic, and that summed up the whole approach there. Not again.

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: I would like to thanx Nafisah & Front Office Team for let me stay your lovely hotel. it was such lovely stay with my fiance since her birthday,she was happy with the room,high floor,nice view & clean room. I also like to thanks Azhar the bellman for sending the birthday cake to the room. Thanks Alls.. will recommend this hotel to others friends.😉😁

title: Oceania and Asia pacific powerlifting competition
desc: I came to compete in the Oceania powerlifting competition 2017 and the hotel was great, stunning location close to everything you would need. facilities included gymnasium, swimming pool and laundry. also staff members extremely helpful (muthalip) and I never waited long for the lifts

title: Practical for business travelers
desc: When on business travel, the foremost important thing is convenience and location. For anyone visiting Changi business park and near abouts, Park Avenue is a very practical option. Staff is helpful and very efficient at what they do. Given the self sufficient kitchen, I'm sure long term stay would also be quite practical. I didn't use the kitchen in room since my stay was limited. Would definitely like to come back again.

title: Everything you'd want and need
desc: Accommodation is comfortable and clean and staff are friendly and hard-working. Pool facility is top notch with a great view. I also never waited for longer than ten seconds for a lift throughout my one week stay. Would recommend.

title: A good, basic hotel
desc: As background, this was my third business trip to Singapore. For my previous two trips, I stayed in Marina Bay and was spoiled by the luxury of the upscale hotels in that area. So while the Park Avenue Changi hotel is advertised as a luxury hotel, it is nowhere near the level of those in Marina Bay. It is a good, basic, no-frills hotel. The room was quiet and clean, if without a single chest of drawers for storage space ( I put my clothes on a table) . There is no restaurant on site which only presented a problem on Sunday morning. As with most of Singapore, there are eateries everywhere and getting a basic breakfast, lunch, or dinner (there are no real upscale restaurants that I could find) with a five minute walk is not a problem - except on Sunday morning. Since the

title: Great serviced hotel and helpful staff!
desc: Great roomy hotel for the family! Special thanks to Muthalip for optimizing the lugguage packing!! 😁 Well equipped with amenities for long term stays. Functional roof top pool, and gym with good view!

title: Good to Excellent!!!
desc: Inadequate space at the lobby for clients to sit down. Reception desk is very helpful and courteous, rooms are big enough, but toiletries are lacking specially if room is for 2 people, they only have for one person. Overall rating - Good towards excellent.

title: Awesome Experience
desc: Stay is really awesome. Provided with home facilities like Induction cookware, washing machine, toaster, juicer, oven etc., simply superb. Loving this suite room. Thank you team for making my business trip so joyful and enjoyable.

title: Park Avenue Changi Hotel, Singapore
desc: We chose Park Avenue because it was near the Changi Airport, a ten minute ride which cost 15.00 CDN. Would have liked a hotel with breakfast and when booking thought it had shuttle service. A nice hotel if you want to be near the airport but in a business area and not close to downtown. Not much to do in that area. Good for an overnight stay.

title: Almost perfect staycation...
desc: We had a one-night staycation to celebrate our wedding anniversary with our little one. Had smooth and pleasant check-in experience by one of the friendly male staff and we were thankful to him. The hotel and the room were very clean and well maintained. Loved the full height glass windows and bath tub, which made our 18-month son very happy. The next morning, we had an unpleasant experience with a counter staff named Ruby. When responding to our queries on check-out timing and car park coupons, she was impatient and impolite. Not only did she appeared reluctant attending to us, her curt replies make us feel disrespected. We were shocked by the disparity in service compared to the previous day. The encounter with Ruby left a scar to our otherwise enjoyable stay at Park Avenue

title: A Very Well Organised Hotel and very efficient Staff
desc: I stayed here for three weeks, and found it very convenient for Changi Business Park, and access to the city is easy via Train. The rooms are very nice and kept impeccably clean. The staff are very friendly and keen to help. All in all a very enjoyable stay. I recommend this hotel unreservedly.

title: Full glass window panes
desc: Room: 4 stars - size ok, great view of planes landing, bed comfortable Toilet: 3.5 stars - small, tub for 1 person (acceptable, can't ask for more) Comfort: 3.5 stars - air-conditioning emits warm air too to control the room temperature (it's a no-no for me) Place: 5 stars - great convenience - hypermart, shopping mall, MRT stations, and eateries within walk. Staff: very friendly, esp Ms Natasha has a good grasp of guests preference. She allocated a perfect room only after the first chat while checking in. Good job! Overall, staff went the extra mile 4/5 stars!

title: Great location
desc: We stayed for a couple of days in the hotel and enjoyed our time. Clean room, Right on position, fair and reasonable price. We had a wonderful time here, especially thanks to Mr. Muthalip our lovely and always helpful. We will come back.

title: Park Avenue Changi - One of the best places to stay in Changi
desc: Park Avenue Changi has been my favourite whenever I visit Singapore on Business trips. The hotel is in close proximity to almost all Offices in Changi Business Park. The services are excellent inside the hotel. Breakfast services are very good and one can chose from Chinese, Indian, Continental buffets on a daily basis 7 days a week. The in room services are very nice and the amenities provided are just perfect for people who are on business trips or short stays of about 1-2 months. I would definitely recommend the Hotel and it has been my 6th stay at this place so far.

title: Good Hotel, well maintained.
desc: Nice experience so far. Daily house keeping, neat and clean. Staff were helpful. Good options for breakfast. Enjoyed my stay. I will review this once I check out. I would recommend to all business travelers looking for a place near Changi. Thanks.

title: Nice room and perfect location
desc: I booked a Deluxe Hot Deal room (no breakfast included), and it's definitely one of the best hotel I have ever stayed in Singapore. The room is very clean, spacious, it has kitchen and its equipment such as electric stove, glass and plate and water boiler, dining table, washing machine, sofa with big screen TV, king size bed with big screen TV also. Bathroom is nice with bathtub. Hairdryer, satefy box, ironing set, and tap water for you to drink anytime. Staffs were so helpful they helped me to print my concert ticket from email with no fee. The hotel is so close to Expo MRT and it is right next to Changi City Point mall with many factory outles so you can get best price for shopping. But if you want to go to the city centre, it is quite a distance (very close to Changi

title: Good Service and facilities
desc: very Friendly staff , the hotel gives you a phone with number , so you don need to buy one in Singapore. Close to the aiport. cabs are easily available. Rooms are comfortable with full glass windows. Muthalip was very fiendly and helpful.

title: Excellent service
desc: Booked a 2 bedroom suites in October for daughter's nearby venue. From front deskcustomer service, to bellboy, concierge staff and all.. they are giving their best services to us. Could not thanks them more for their superb services. Special thanks to staff Mr. Muthalip and Mr. Shafiee (hope I got his name right).

title: Nice hotel
desc: I stayed in the hotel just few days ago. Good hotel to stay with a nice room and bed. Feels hommie. Great location for people attending exhibition, 5 mins walk from the expo center. Next to mall and MRT station. The staff also very friendly, especially Muthalip.

title: Great hotel!
desc: I was served by Mr Mansor(sorry if i spell his name wrongly) his customer service was superb. It was a great one night spend for my birthday. I receive a fruit basket from the hotel too! Definitely a recommended hotel to stay as it is near the MRT and a Mall too!

title: Really average, will not be staying again.
desc: This hotel is in a business park out near Changi Airport. The only imaginable reason why anyone would stay there would be as they were doing business at the park or visiting the expo. What was good: - Rooms are okay and seem to be in good repair - Err...that's it What needs to be improved - Breakfast sucks! (see below) - room lighting is a challenge - I didn't sleep well at all (but perhaps that's me) - Zero facilities - The hotel is overrun by noisy tour groups I stayed on a corporate rate that included breakfast. When I checked in they didn't give me any vouchers. I asked in the morning and the front desk staff assured me in that 'we know better' officious tone that my corporate rate excluded breakfast (what corporate rates ever exclude breakfast!) Anyway, I briefly

title: Park Avenue experience
desc: Manager Manzoor Ali and his friendly staffs expedite our check-in smoothly and attended to all our petty requests promptly. Our suite was very cozy and my children wouldn't want to leave.Luckily this hotel is surrounded by many food establishments and we're spoilt for choice.

title: Great spot for a few nights
desc: We stayed here for a couple of nights on route home rather than stay at the airport or closer in, meaning not such an early start for our flight. We took a taxi which cost about $14 both ways. Had we not had so much luggage we would have taken the train, which is a very short walk across the road. It was a reasonable price for a large twin room with plenty of storage space for anyone staying for business. The bar fridge was great for keeping any food. Theres a large supermarket across the courtyard and a couple of restaurants. The shopping centre, a 2 min walk away, has plenty of dining options both indoor and out. Staff were friendly, especially the man who took our bags to the room. Unfortunately a few large tourist groups seemed to be staying at the same time, they were

title: Ok for a one nighter
desc: Rooms were great. Nothing in the mini bar at all. No breakfast facilities other than over the mall. As an early riser I couldn't find any place opened to have a good coffe. They do have a kettle with instant coffee and coffee mate for milk. We arrived very late at night so just stayed near the airport. Would I stay here again? Probably not. It is not a place to stay on a holiday but ok for business.

title: Convenient to Airport and Expo Centre
desc: Well positioned to Airport and Expo Centre. Train station 5 minutes walk as well as the Expo Centre and massive shopping precinct. Plenty of Restaurants however after 6.00pm many close which reduces selection for evening dining. Would certainly stay again. Disappointed that there was no restaurant in house, however I was advised this was due to renovation of facility being carried out. Offered a token to obtain discount at restaurant across the way from reception. Room was clean, no mini-bar however could have had milk and snacks (biscuits) provided. However, a good supermarket a few minutes walk provided the necessary products however no cutlery or utensils in room so had to purchase a knife to cut the fruit I purchased. Service was very good, discreet and friendly. Overall

title: Close to Singapore Expo
desc: The reason I picked Park Avenue Changi Hotel was so I could stay near the Singapore Expo, where I had a business conference. The hotel lobby was small but the service was very efficient. The rooms were clean and well lit, and the bed very comfortable. The only issue I had was the internet connection. I was informed that they had some issues with it when I stayed. The TV screen also greeted me as "Mr. Lee" Apart from that, the hotel was very nice.

title: Excellent room
desc: This my second time stay here, great hotel,well equipped kitchen with all utensils,check in fast, staff is attentive,check in early by the gentleman, if not mistake his name,Mr Justin. Room is clean, bed and pillow are comfortable

title: Good hotel, close to airport
desc: About $10 in a taxi from the airport, so very handy. Good clean tidy rooms, very comfortable bed & pillows. No restaurant in the hotel, but lots of location cafes, bars and restaurants within a short walk and a relationship with a Yum Cha 30 seconds walk away. The Yum Cha looked simple, but the food was simple and tasty (I only had breakfast there). A well equipped gym on the rooftop & lap pool which was great before jumping on a flight home. All of the staff were great - particular mention to Muthalip who was new there and very fun and friendly. If you need to be close to the airport or in the Changi Business Park, this is a good option.

title: Family Staycation
desc: I organised a family staycation last weekend. I was greeted warmly by Choon Yen. He was professional and check in was quick. I was escorted to the elevator by his manager Nafisah. She informed me the way how to scan the room keys at the sensor. Quite tricky at first. Glad she show us! The room was a good size for a family of four and the bed was comfortable. There was no restaurant for room service but there is a mall nearby with plenty of local food and restaurants. NTUC supermarket close by is a plus too. Night time was very quiet as the hotel is right smacked in the Business Park area. Very pleasant staycation! Thank you Choon Yen and Nafisah for your wonderful services. My family and I will definitely return.

title: Good for a one nighter.
desc: Booked this as the ones at the airport were all booked out. Only a 10 min taxi ride. The room was actually really nice. It was spacious and very clean. Even had facilities for cooking if required. We used it to have a sleep. Catch a 20 min ride into town to check it out and then buy a couple of things at the supermarket just nearby. If you're thinking of going into town as well as being close to the airport this was good at the right price.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Polite service by the team. Rooms were very clean. Best was the free data and voice mobile service which the hotel provided. Decent option of F&B breakfast options. Hotel was very near to my work location.

title: Great location near the airport
desc: Had a long transit and chose to stay at this hotel as it us close to tge airport. Great hotel in a good location that next to a large shoppubg centre was great food choices. Hotel is also next to the MRT. Was upgraded to a suite and was like a one bedroom apartment. Great for transit stays!

title: Clean, comfortable, not very efficient
